13.2: “Paaiv deix mienh mingh zaah Kaa^naa^an Deic-Bung, dongh yie oix ceix bun I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei deic-bung. Ziux ong-taaix liepc daaih nyei fingx, oix zuqc yietc fingx paaiv dauh wuov fingx nyei bieiv zeiv.”
13.31: Mv baac caux ninh mingh zaah deic-bung nyei mienh gorngv, “Mbuo maiv maaih banh zeic mborqv wuov deix mienh weic zuqc ninh mbuo gauh henv mbuo.”
13.6: Yu^ndaa Fingx Ye^fun^ne nyei dorn, Kaalepv
13.8: E^faa^im Fingx Nun nyei dorn, Ho^se^yaa
13.24: Wuov norm dorngx ninh mbuo cuotv mbuox heuc Etc^ko, weic zuqc I^saa^laa^en Mienh yiem naaic hngaqv wuov joih a'ngunc biouv.
13.25: Jiex liuz feix ziepc hnoi, zaah deic-bung nyei mienh ziouc nzuonx daaih.
13.29: Aa^maa^lekv Mienh yiem Negepc, Hitv^tai Mienh, Ye^mbutc Mienh caux Aa^mo^lai Mienh yiem mbong zaangc. Kaa^naa^an Mienh yiem nitv koiv yaac yiem Jor^ndaen Ndaaih hlen.”
13.11: Maa^natv^se Fingx Susi nyei dorn, Gatc^ndi
13.32: Ninh mbuo ziouc gorngv doqc ninh mbuo zaah liuz wuov norm deic-bung nyei jauv-louc, bun naaiv deix waac sing buangv I^saa^laa^en nyei zuangx mienh. Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Yie mbuo zaah wuov norm deic-bung haih nyanc mienh nyei. Yiem naaic nyei zuangx mienh yaac hlo haic, hlang haic.
13.16: Naaiv se Mose paaiv mingh zaah deic-bung wuov deix mienh nyei mbuox. (Mose tiuv Nun nyei dorn, Ho^se^yaa, nyei mbuox benx Yo^su^waa.)

9.21: Maaih deix ziangh hoc mbuonx yiem lungh hmuangx taux lungh ndorm hnangv. Lungh ndorm mbuonx faaux nyei ziangh hoc, ninh mbuo ziouc cuotv jauv aqv. Maiv gunv lungh hnoi fai lungh muonz zanc, da'faanh mbuonx faaux, ninh mbuo cuotv jauv aqv.
9.15: Liepc jiez zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei ndopv-liuh wuov hnoi, se Laengz Ngaengc Waac nyei Ndopv-Liuh, maaih dorv mbuonx daaih om jienv. Lungh maanz-hmuangx taux lungh njang buatc mbuonx hnangv douz nor.
9.12: Ninh mbuo maiv dungx liouh yietc deix taux njang hnoi ndorm. Yaac maiv dungx bun yungh nyei mbungv nauv yietc diuh. Jiex Siex Maengc Zipv ninh mbuo oix zuqc gan nzengc diuh diuh leiz.
9.17: Mbuonx haaix zanc yiem Ndopv-Liuh gu'nguaaic faaux, I^saa^laa^en Mienh ziouc cuotv jauv. Mbuonx dingh njiec haaix, I^saa^laa^en Mienh aengx corng ndopv-liuh ciangv yiem wuov.
9.20: Maaih ziangh hoc mbuonx yiem wuov norm ndopv-liuh gu'nguaaic i ziex hnoi hnangv. Ziux Ziouv  paaiv nyei waac, ninh mbuo corng ndopv-liuh ciangv. Yaac ziux Ziouv paaiv nyei waac, ninh mbuo cuotv jauv.
9.4: Mose ziouc mbuox I^saa^laa^en Mienh jiex Siex Maengc Zipv.
9.19: Mbuonx haaix zanc yiem zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei ndopv-liuh gu'nguaaic lauh nyei, I^saa^laa^en Mienh muangx Ziouv mbuox nyei waac, maiv cuotv jauv aqv.
9.18: Ziux Ziouv  mbuox nyei waac, I^saa^laa^en Mienh cuotv jauv. Yaac ziux Ziouv  mbuox nyei waac, ninh mbuo corng ndopv-liuh ciangv. Da'faanh mbuonx corc yiem zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei Ndopv-Liuh gu'nguaaic, ninh mbuo corc corng jienv yiem wuov nyei.
9.22: Maiv gunv mbuonx yiem zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei ndopv-liuh gu'nguaaic i hnoi, fai yietc hlaax, fai yietc hnyangx, ninh mbuo corc corng jienv ndopv-liuh ciangv yiem wuov nyei, maiv cuotv jauv. Mv baac mbuonx haaix zanc faaux, ninh mbuo ziouc cuotv jauv aqv.
9.23: Ziux Ziouv  mbuox nyei waac, ninh mbuo corng ndopv-liuh ciangv. Yaac ziux Ziouv  mbuox nyei waac, ninh mbuo cuotv jauv. Ninh mbuo ei nzengc Ziouv  nyei waac ziux Ziouv  longc Mose mbuox ninh mbuo.
9.13: Mv baac se gorngv maaih mienh cing-nzengc nyei, maiv maaih uix, yaac maiv cuotv jauv mingh go nyei dorngx, youc maiv jiex Siex Maengc Zipv nor, wuov dauh yiem ninh nyei mienh gu'nyuoz oix zuqc pai guangc, weic zuqc dingc daaih nyei ziangh hoc ninh maiv dorh ga'naaiv fongc horc Ziouv. Ninh zoux nyei zuiz ninh ganh oix zuqc ndaam-dorng.
9.5: Zih hlaax, ziepc feix wuov hnoi, nziemx-yaangh nyei ziangh hoc, ninh mbuo yiem Sinaai Deic-Bung-Huaang jiex zipv. Ziux Ziouv  paaiv Mose, I^saa^laa^en Mienh ei jienv zoux nzengc.
9.14: “+‘Se gorngv yiem meih mbuo gu'nyuoz maaih ganh fingx mienh oix jiex Ziouv  nyei Siex Maengc Zipv, ninh oix zuqc ziux zipv nyei leiz-nyeic caux diuh diuh leiz-latc zoux. Maiv gunv Janx fai buonv-fingx mienh, oix zuqc maaih nduqc nyungc leiz hnangv.’+”
9.3: Naaiv norm hlaax, ziepc feix wuov hnoi, mba'hnoi ndortv nyei ziangh hoc, oix zuqc ziux dingc daaih nyei hnoi-nyieqc ei jienv zipv nyei leiz-nyeic caux diuh diuh leiz-latc jiex zipv.”
9.7: gorngv mbuox Mose, “Yie mbuo laaix muoqv zuqc janx-daic maaih uix, mv baac weic haaix diuc maiv bun yie mbuo taux dingc daaih nyei ziangh hoc duqv caux wuov deix I^saa^laa^en Mienh dorh ga'naaiv fongc horc Ziouv?  ”
9.10: “Oix zuqc mbuox I^saa^laa^en Mienh, ‘Se gorngv meih mbuo haaix dauh fai meih mbuo nyei fun-faqv laaix muoqv zuqc janx-daic maaih uix, fai maaih mienh cuotv jauv mingh go nyei dorngx, ninh mbuo corc haih jiex Ziouv  nyei Siex Maengc Zipv.
9.2: “Taux dingc daaih nyei ziangh hoc, oix zuqc bun I^saa^laa^en Mienh jiex Siex Maengc Zipv.
9.1: I^saa^laa^en Mienh cuotv I^yipv Deic-Bung liuz, da'nyeic hnyangx zih hlaax, yiem Sinaai Deic-Bung-Huaang, Ziouv  gorngv mbuox Mose,
9.6: Mv baac maaih deix mienh laaix muoqv zuqc janx-daic maaih uix. Doix wuov norm hnoi maiv haih jiex Siex Maengc Zipv. Dongh wuov hnoi ninh mbuo daaih taux Mose caux Aalon mbuo wuov,
9.8: Mose dau, “Zuov muangx gaax Ziouv  oix hnangv haaix nor paaiv meih mbuo nyei sic.”
9.11: Taux nyeic hlaax, ziepc feix wuov hnoi, mba'hnoi ndortv nyei ziangh hoc, ninh mbuo oix zuqc jiex zipv. Oix zuqc nyanc jiex zipv nyei ba'gi yungh dorn caux maiv an bingv nyei njuov caux im nyei ga'naaiv-ndaang.
9.16: Yaac zanc-zanc hnangv naaiv nor. Wuov dorv mbuonx om jienv, lungh muonz zanc buatc hnangv douz.

26.21: Beletv nyei fun-faqv maaih Hetv^lon nyei bungh buonc, Hetv^lon Mienh, Haamun nyei bungh buonc, Haamun Mienh.
26.15: Gaatc nyei fun-faqv ziux ninh mbuo nyei bungh buonc maaih Sefon nyei bungh buonc, Sefon Mienh, Hakv^gi nyei bungh buonc, Hakv^gi Mienh, Suni nyei bungh buonc, Suni Mienh,
26.23: Itc^saax^kaa nyei fun-faqv ziux ninh mbuo nyei bungh buonc maaih Tolaa nyei bungh buonc, Tolaa Mienh, Pu^aa nyei bungh buonc, Pu^aa Mienh,
26.47: Naaiv se Aa^se nyei bungh buonc. Yietc zungv maaih biaa waanc buo cin feix baeqv dauh.
26.56: Oix zuqc ziux haaix fingx mienh camv fai zoqc dingc maengc mangc weic paaiv ndau bun nqoi ninh mbuo nzipc.”
26.20: Yu^ndaa nyei fun-faqv ziux ninh mbuo nyei bungh buonc maaih Qelaa nyei bungh buonc, Qelaa Mienh, Beletv nyei bungh buonc, Beletv Mienh, Zelaa nyei bungh buonc, Zelaa Mienh.
26.18: Naaiv se Gaatc nyei bungh buonc. Yietc zungv maaih biei waanc hmz baeqv dauh.
26.33: (Hefe nyei dorn, Se^lo^fe^hatc, maiv maaih dorn, kungx maaih sieqv hnangv. Ninh nyei sieqv nyei mbuox maaih Maa^haa^laa, Noyaa, Hokv^laa, Minkaa caux Ti^laa^saa.)
26.43: Yietc zungv zoux Su^ham Mienh yaac maaih juqv waanc biei cin feix baeqv dauh.
26.48: Napv^taa^li nyei fun-faqv ziux ninh mbuo nyei bungh buonc maaih Yaa^se^en nyei bungh buonc, Yaa^se^en Mienh, Guni nyei bungh buonc, Guni Mienh,
26.22: Naaiv se Yu^ndaa nyei bungh buonc. Yietc zungv maaih siec waanc juqv cin hmz baeqv dauh.
26.42: Ndaan nyei fun-faqv ziux ninh mbuo nyei bungh buonc maaih Su^ham nyei bungh buonc, Su^ham Mienh. Naaiv se Ndaan nyei bungh buonc.
26.50: Naaiv se Napv^taa^li nyei bungh buonc. Yietc zungv maaih biei waanc biaa cin feix baeqv dauh.
26.31: Atc^li^en nyei bungh buonc, Atc^li^en Mienh. Sekem nyei bungh buonc, Sekem Mienh,
26.4: “Oix zuqc saauv nzengc yiem nyic ziepc hnyangx faaux maengx nyei m'jangc dorn ziux Ziouv mbuox Mose.” Yiem I^yipv Deic-Bung cuotv daaih nyei I^saa^laa^en Mienh maaih hnangv naaiv.
26.63: Naaiv se Mose caux E^le^aa^saa sai mienh yiem Mo^apc ndau-baengh, Jor^ndaen Ndaaih hlen, Ye^li^ko Zingh doix-ngaanc saauv nyei I^saa^laa^en Mienh.
26.29: Maa^natv^se nyei fun-faqv maaih Maa^ki^le nyei bungh buonc, Maa^ki^le Mienh, (Maa^ki^le zoux Gi^le^aatc nyei die.) Gi^le^aatc nyei bungh buonc, Gi^le^aatc Mienh.
26.9: E^li^apc nyei dorn, Ne^mu^en, Ndaataan caux Aa^mbi^lam. Se dongh naaiv deix Ndaataan caux Aa^mbi^lam, zuangx mienh ginv daaih nyei. Ninh mbuo ngaengc Mose caux Aalon ziouc caux jienv gan Kolaa wuov deix ngaengc Ziouv.
26.37: Naaiv se E^faa^im nyei bungh buonc. Yietc zungv maaih buo waanc i cin hmz baeqv dauh. Naaiv se Yosepv nyei fun-faqv ziux ninh mbuo nyei bungh buonc.
26.58: Aengx maaih naaiv deix Lewi Mienh ziux ninh mbuo nyei bungh buonc. Maaih Lipv^ni nyei bungh buonc, Lipv^ni Mienh, He^mbo^lon nyei bungh buonc, He^mbo^lon Mienh, Maali nyei bungh buonc, Maali Mienh, Musi nyei bungh buonc, Musi Mienh, Kolaa nyei bungh buonc, Kolaa Mienh. (Ko^haatv zoux Amlaam nyei die.
26.5: I^saa^laa^en nyei dorn-hlo, Lu^mben, nyei fun-faqv maaih Haanokv nyei bungh buonc, Haanokv Mienh, Banlu nyei bungh buonc, Banlu Mienh,
26.62: Lewi Mienh nyei soux mouc, buangv hlaax faaux maengx nyei m'jangc dorn, maaih i waanc buo cin dauh. Ninh mbuo maiv duqv funx bieqc I^saa^laa^en Mienh, weic zuqc yiem I^saa^laa^en nyei zuangx mienh mbu'ndongx maiv maaih ninh mbuo nzipc nyei buonc.
26.3: Mose caux E^le^aa^saa sai mienh ziouc yiem Mo^apc ndau-baengh, Jor^ndaen Ndaaih hlen, Ye^li^ko Zingh doix-ngaanc, doix I^saa^laa^en Mienh gorngv,
26.64: Ih zanc saauv nyei mienh, maiv maaih yietc dauh dongh zinh ndaangc Mose caux Aalon sai mienh yiem Sinaai Deic-Bung-Huaang saauv nyei aqv.
26.39: Se^fu^faam nyei bungh buonc, Se^fu^faam Mienh, Hufaam nyei bungh buonc, Hufaam Mienh.
26.6: Hetv^lon nyei bungh buonc, Hetv^lon Mienh, Kaanmi nyei bungh buonc, Kaanmi Mienh.
26.57: Lewi Mienh ziux ninh mbuo nyei bungh buonc maaih Geson nyei bungh buonc, Geson Mienh, Ko^haatv nyei bungh buonc, Ko^haatv Mienh, Me^laa^li nyei bungh buonc, Me^laa^li Mienh.
26.46: (Aa^se maaih dauh sieqv mbuox heuc Se^laa^aa.)
26.7: Naaiv se Lu^mben Fingx bun njiec nyei bungh buonc. Yietc zungv maaih biei waanc buo cin cietv baeqv faah ziepc dauh.
26.32: Se^mi^ndaa nyei bungh buonc, Se^mi^ndaa Mienh, Hefe nyei bungh buonc, Hefe Mienh.
26.25: Naaiv se Itc^saax^kaa nyei bungh buonc. Yietc zungv maaih juqv waanc biei cin faam-baeqv dauh.
26.17: Aalotv nyei bungh buonc, Aalotv Mienh, Aa^le^li nyei bungh buonc, Aa^le^li Mienh.
26.61: Mv baac Naa^ndapc caux Aa^mbi^hu dorh maiv maaih leiz longc nyei douz yiem Ziouv nyei nza'hmien ziec, ziouc daic mi'aqv.)
26.12: Si^me^on nyei fun-faqv ziux ninh mbuo nyei bungh buonc maaih Ne^mu^en nyei bungh buonc, Ne^mu^en Mienh, Yaamin nyei bungh buonc, Yaamin Mienh, Yaakin nyei bungh buonc, Yaakin Mienh,
26.65: Weic zuqc Ziouv  mbuox wuov deix I^saa^laa^en Mienh ninh mbuo zungv oix zuqc yiem deic-bung-huaang daic nzengc. Cuotv liuz Ye^fun^ne nyei dorn, Kaalepv, caux Nun nyei dorn, Yo^su^waa, ninh mbuo maiv zengc yietc dauh aqv.
26.34: Naaiv se Maa^natv^se nyei bungh buonc. Yietc zungv maaih biaa waanc i cin cietv baeqv dauh.
26.30: Naaiv se Gi^le^aatc nyei fun-faqv. Maaih I^ye^se nyei bungh buonc, I^ye^se Mienh, Helekv nyei bungh buonc, Helekv Mienh,
26.11: Mv baac Kolaa nyei dorn mbuo maiv zuqc daic.
26.28: Yosepv nyei fun-faqv, ziux Maa^natv^se caux E^faa^im nyei bungh buonc, maaih hnangv naaiv.
26.44: Aa^se nyei fun-faqv ziux ninh mbuo nyei bungh buonc maaih Imnaa nyei bungh buonc, Imnaa Mienh, Itc^wi nyei bungh buonc, Itc^wi Mienh, Mbe^li^yaa nyei bungh buonc, Mbe^li^yaa Mienh.
26.45: Mbe^li^yaa nyei fun-faqv maaih He^mbe nyei bungh buonc, He^mbe Mienh. Man^ki^en nyei bungh buonc, Man^ki^en Mienh.
26.19: E^aa caux Onan zoux Yu^ndaa nyei dorn mv baac ninh mbuo yiem Kaa^naa^an Deic-Bung daic mi'aqv.
26.54: Haaix fingx mienh camv oix zuqc paaiv bun ninh mbuo nzipc jangv. Haaix fingx zoqc bun ninh mbuo nzipc gauh hepc. Fingx-fingx ziux ninh mbuo nyei soux mouc oix zuqc nzipc ninh mbuo nyei buonc.
26.35: E^faa^im nyei fun-faqv ziux ninh mbuo nyei bungh buonc maaih Su^te^laa nyei bungh buonc, Su^te^laa Mienh, Mbeke nyei bungh buonc, Mbeke Mienh, Taa^han nyei bungh buonc, Taa^han Mienh.
26.41: Naaiv se Mben^yaa^min nyei bungh buonc. Yietc zungv maaih biei waanc biaa cin luoqc baeqv dauh.
26.13: Zelaa nyei bungh buonc, Zelaa Mienh, Saa^un nyei bungh buonc, Saa^un Mienh.
26.60: Aalon zoux Naa^ndapc caux Aa^mbi^hu, E^le^aa^saa caux I^taa^maa nyei die.
26.59: Amlaam nyei auv nyei mbuox heuc Yo^ke^mbetc, se Lewi Mienh, dongh Lewi nyei zeiv-fun, cuotv seix yiem I^yipv Deic-Bung. Yo^ke^mbetc yungz i dauh dorn, Aalon caux Mose, aengx yungz ninh mbuo nyei dorc, Miliem, bun Amlaam.
26.40: Mbelaa nyei fun-faqv ziux Aatc caux Naa^aa^maan nyei bungh buonc maaih Aatc nyei bungh buonc, Aatc Mienh, Naa^aa^maan nyei bungh buonc, Naa^aa^maan Mienh.
26.55: Yaac oix zuqc ziux ong-taaix mbuo nyei fingx nyei mbuox dingc maengc mangc haaix dauh duqv haaix bung ndau.
26.26: Se^mbu^lun nyei fun-faqv ziux ninh mbuo nyei bungh buonc maaih Seletv nyei bungh buonc, Seletv Mienh, Elon nyei bungh buonc, Elon Mienh, Yaa^le^en nyei bungh buonc, Yaa^le^en Mienh.
26.14: Naaiv se Si^me^on nyei bungh buonc. Yietc zungv maaih i waanc i cin nyic baeqv dauh.
26.27: Naaiv se Se^mbu^lun nyei bungh buonc. Yietc zungv maaih juqv waanc hmz baeqv dauh.
26.38: Mben^yaa^min nyei fun-faqv ziux ninh mbuo nyei bungh buonc maaih Mbelaa nyei bungh buonc, Mbelaa Mienh, Atc^mben nyei bungh buonc, Atc^mben Mienh, Aa^hi^lam nyei bungh buonc, Aa^hi^lam Mienh,
26.49: Yese nyei bungh buonc, Yese Mienh, Sinlem nyei bungh buonc, Sinlem Mienh.
26.36: Su^te^laa nyei fun-faqv maaih Elaan nyei bungh buonc, Elaan Mienh.
26.53: “Oix zuqc ziux mienh nyei soux mouc zorqv ndau paaiv bun nqoi ninh mbuo nzipc.
26.10: Ndau ziouc nqoi hnangv morngx nqoi nzuih, naqv ninh mbuo caux Kolaa. Wuov zanc gan Kolaa nyei mienh yaac zuqc douz buov mietc nyic baeqv hmz ziepc dauh. Naaiv se zoux jangx-hoc donv mienh.
26.2: “Oix zuqc saauv nzengc I^saa^laa^en nyei zuangx mienh, ziux mienh buonc yiem nyic ziepc hnyangx faaux maengx, haih zoux duqv baeng nyei m'jangc dorn saauv nzengc.”
26.1: Domh wuon-baengc jiex liuz, nqa'haav Ziouv  gorngv mbuox Mose caux Aalon sai mienh nyei dorn, E^le^aa^saa,
26.24: Yaasupv nyei bungh buonc, Yaasupv Mienh, Simlon nyei bungh buonc, Simlon Mienh.
26.16: Otc^ni nyei bungh buonc, Otc^ni Mienh, E^le^i nyei bungh buonc, E^le^i mienh,
26.51: I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei m'jangc dorn yietc zungv maaih juqv sinx yietc cin cietv baeqv faah ziepc dauh.

5.21: (taux naaiv norm dorngx, sai mienh bun naaiv dauh m'sieqv dorn ziux ninh laengz ngaengc waac zuqc houv. Sai mienh aengx gorngv), “tov Ziouv  bun meih nyei ga'sie omx, camh zuih jaic, nyaux nzengc, ziouc yiem meih nyei mienh mbu'ndongx zoux zuqc mienh houv, zuqc mienh zioux nyei mienh.
5.15: nqox oix zuqc dorh ninh nyei auv mingh sai mienh wuov. Yaac oix zuqc weic ninh nyei auv dorh jienv i morqv mbaali mbiauh mbuonv. Yaac maiv dungx dox ga'lanv youh, maiv dungx zorqv hung an gu'nguaaic, weic zuqc naaiv deix ziec nyei ga'naaiv se weic nzaeng-buang nyei jauv, weic jangx mienh zoux dorngc nyei sic.
5.12: “Oix zuqc mbuox I^saa^laa^en Mienh, ‘Se gorngv haaix dauh mienh nyei auv yangh pien zaux-mbiec, maiv ziepc zuoqv nyei zoux bun ninh nyei nqox,
5.17: ziouc zorqv deix cing-nzengc nyei wuom daaih dapv nie-baengh, aengx nyau deix zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei ndopv-liuh nyei ndau nyei nie-mbung dapv jienv.
5.30: Fai mienh laaic ninh nyei auv maaih jauv ziouc hanc ninh nyei auv. Sai mienh oix zuqc bun wuov dauh m'sieqv dorn yiem Ziouv  nyei nza'hmien yaac ei jienv naaiv nyungc leiz-latc nyei diuh diuh leiz zoux.
5.20: Mv baac se gorngv meih yiem nqox nyei buoz-ndiev aengx yangh pien zaux-mbiec ziouc zoux maiv cing-nzengc, caux ganh dauh m'jangc dorn bueix, maiv zeiz ganh nyei nqox,”
5.4: I^saa^laa^en Mienh ziouc hnangv naaiv nor zoux, hatc ninh mbuo cuotv ga'nyiec ziqc ndopv-liuh ciangv. Ziouv  hnangv haaix nor mbuox Mose, I^saa^laa^en Mienh ziouc hnangv wuov nor zoux.
5.28: Mv baac se gorngv wuov dauh mienh cing-nzengc nyei, maiv yangh pien zaux-mbiec, ziouc bun cing ninh maiv dorngc, yaac haih maaih gu'nguaaz nyei.
5.19: ziouc heuc wuov dauh m'sieqv dorn laengz jiez ngaengc waac. Sai mienh gorngv mbuox ninh, “Se gorngv maiv maaih ganh dauh m'jangc dorn caux meih bueix, meih yaac maiv yangh pien zaux-mbiec, yiem jienv nqox nyei buoz-ndiev maiv zoux maiv cing-nzengc nyei sic, tov bun naaiv deix houv nyei wuom hoic maiv zuqc meih.
5.18: Sai mienh ziouc bun wuov dauh m'sieqv dorn souv jienv Ziouv nyei nza'hmien yaac jaiv nqoi ninh nyei mba'biei, aengx zorqv weic nzaeng-buang nyei jauv, weic jangx mienh zoux dorngc nyei sic wuov deix ziec nyei mbuonv, bun ninh bouh jienv. Sai mienh ganh bouh jienv houv mienh nyei wuom-im,
5.22: Tov bun naaiv deix houv mienh nyei wuom-im bieqc meih nyei ga'sie, bun meih nyei ga'sie omx, camh zuih jaic, nyaux nzengc.” “+‘Wuov dauh m'sieqv dorn oix zuqc dau, “Aamen. Aamen.”
5.23: “+‘Sai mienh ziouc fiev naaiv deix houv nyei waac yiem sou-njunc, aengx nzaaux naaiv deix nzaangc bieqc wuov deix wuom-im.
5.13: ziouc caux ganh dauh m'jangc dorn bueix beic ninh nyei nqox, maiv gunv ninh zoux maiv cing-nzengc, maiv maaih haaix dauh zoux zorng-zengx, (weic zuqc bueix nyei ziangh hoc mienh zorqv maiv duqv),
5.9: I^saa^laa^en Mienh dorh daaih fungx bun sai mienh nyei yietc zungv cing-nzengc nyei ga'naaiv ziouc benx sai mienh nyei.
5.26: Ninh aengx zorqv yietc nyau weic jangx mienh zoux dorngc nyei sic ziec nyei mbuonv hietv ziec-dorngh buov. Buov liuz, ziouc heuc wuov dauh m'sieqv dorn hopv naaiv deix wuom.
5.27: Se gorngv ninh zoux maiv cing-nzengc nyei sic, maiv ziepc zuoqv zoux bun ninh nyei nqox, yangh pien zaux-mbiec, ninh hopv liuz naaiv deix wuom bieqc mingh, ninh ziouc zuqc diev kouv. Ninh nyei ga'sie omx, camh zuih jaic, nyaux nzengc. Ninh yaac yiem ninh nyei mienh mbu'ndongx zuqc mienh zioux, zuqc mienh houv.
5.14: yaac se gorngv nqox nzaeng-buang, laaic ninh nyei auv maaih jauv, auv yaac za'gengh zoux maiv cing-nzengc, oix zuqc dorh ninh nyei auv mingh sai mienh wuov. Fai se gorngv nqox nzaeng-buang ninh nyei auv, laaic ninh nyei auv maaih jauv, maiv gunv ninh nyei auv maiv maaih, ninh cing-nzengc nyei,
5.3: Maiv gunv m'jangc m'sieqv, oix zuqc hatc cuotv ga'nyiec ziqc ndopv-liuh ciangv weic maiv bun ninh mbuo nyei ciangv, dongh yie yiem ninh mbuo mbu'ndongx nyei dorngx, maaih uix.”
5.7: Ninh oix zuqc nyiemc ninh zoux dorngc nyei zuiz, yaac oix zuqc zorqv ninh zoux dorngc nyei yietc zungv tuix nzuonx bun ninh dorngc wuov dauh, aengx buih biaa gouv nyei yietc gouv.
5.10: Gorqv-mienh nyei cing-nzengc ga'naaiv se gorqv-mienh ganh nyei, mv baac ninh fungx haaix nyungc bun sai mienh, wuov nyungc ziouc benx sai mienh nyei.”
5.2: “Oix zuqc mbuox I^saa^laa^en Mienh hatc butv gomh huv baengc nyei mienh caux sin zaangc cuotv maiv horpc zuqc cuotv nyei haaix nyungc wuom, aengx caux laaix muoqv zuqc janx-daic maaih uix nyei mienh, cuotv ga'nyiec ziqc ndopv-liuh ciangv.
5.31: Nqox yaac maiv maaih zuiz aqv. Mv baac wuov dauh m'sieqv dorn ziux ninh zoux nyei, oix zuqc dingc zuiz.’+”
5.6: “Oix zuqc mbuox I^saa^laa^en Mienh, maiv gunv m'jangc m'sieqv, haaix dauh zoux haaix nyungc dorngc haaix dauh, wuov dauh maiv ziepc zuoqv nyei zoux bun Ziouv, ninh ziouc dorngc mi'aqv.
5.8: Mv baac se gorngv zuqc mienh zoux dorngc wuov dauh daic yaac maiv maaih cien-ceqv laengz wuov deix buih nyei ga'naaiv, oix zuqc bun sai mienh weih fungx bun Ziouv. Liemh weic fiqv ninh nyei zuiz wuov dauh ba'gi yungh gouv oix zuqc bun.
5.24: Ninh ziouc bun wuov dauh m'sieqv dorn hopv naaiv houv nyei wuom-im. Wuom ziouc bieqc ninh nyei sin hoic ninh diev kouv.
5.25: Sai mienh aengx zorqv yiem m'sieqv dorn nyei buoz weic nzaeng-buang nyei sic fongc horc nyei mbuonv, yiem Ziouv nyei nza'hmien bouh jienv cunv ging fongc horc liuz, ziouc dorh mingh taux ziec-dorngh.
5.29: “+‘Naaiv se nzaeng-buang nyei leiz-latc, dongh m'sieqv dorn yangh pien zaux-mbiec, yiem nqox nyei buoz-ndiev mingh zoux maiv cing-nzengc nyei sic.
5.16: “+‘Sai mienh ziouc dorh naaiv dauh m'sieqv dorn daaih souv jienv Ziouv  nyei nza'hmien,

27.21: Ninh oix zuqc souv jienv E^le^aa^saa sai mienh nyei nza'hmien, sai mienh ziouc yiem Ziouv nyei nza'hmien longc Ulim naaic weic tengx dingc hnangv haaix nor zoux. Yo^su^waa caux I^saa^laa^en nyei zuangx mienh oix zuqc ei jienv E^le^aa^saa sai mienh nyei waac bieqc cuotv.”
27.12: Ziouv  mbuox Mose, “Oix zuqc faaux naaiv Aa^mbaa^lim Geh Zorng mangc yie jiu bun I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei deic-bung.
27.17: bun ninh haih yiem ninh mbuo nyei nza'hmien bieqc bieqc cuotv-cuotv, yaac haih dorh ninh mbuo bieqc cuotv, weic bun Ziouv  nyei baeqc fingx maiv hnangv maiv maaih ziouv goux nyei ba'gi yungh guanh nor.”
27.20: Oix zuqc jiu deix meih nyei hatc maaz bun ninh weic bun I^saa^laa^en nyei zuangx mienh muangx ninh nyei waac.
27.4: Laaix yie mbuo nyei die maiv maaih dorn, weic haaix diuc bun ninh nyei mbuox yiem ninh nyei fingx ndortv mingh? Tov bun yie mbuo yiem yie mbuo nyei cien-ceqv mbu'ndongx maaih yie mbuo nzipc nyei buonc maah!”
27.19: Yaac bun ninh souv jienv E^le^aa^saa sai mienh caux gapv zunv nyei zuangx mienh nyei nza'hmien, dorng jienv ninh mbuo paaiv ninh.
27.18: Ziouv  gorngv mbuox Mose, “Dorh Nun nyei dorn, Yo^su^waa, daaih. Ninh maaih Singx Lingh yiem hnyouv nyei. Meih oix zuqc dorh buoz maan jienv ninh.
27.22: Mose ei jienv Ziouv mbuox nyei waac zoux. Ninh dorh Yo^su^waa daaih bun ninh souv jienv E^le^aa^saa sai mienh caux gapv zunv nyei zuangx mienh nyei nza'hmien.
27.23: Ziux Ziouv  mbuox nyei waac, Mose yaac dorh buoz maan jienv Yo^su^waa paaiv ninh.
27.13: Mangc liuz, nqa'haav oix zuqc guei seix aqv, hnangv meih nyei gorx Aalon wuov nor.
27.9: Se gorngv ninh maiv maaih sieqv, oix zuqc zorqv ninh nzipc nyei buonc jiu bun ninh nyei gorx fai youz nzipc.
27.5: Mose ziouc dorh ninh mbuo nyei jauv-louc mbuox Ziouv.
27.14: Weic zuqc yiem Sin Deic-Bung-Huaang, wuom cuotv nyei dorngx, zuangx mienh ngaengc yie wuov zanc, meih mbuo i dauh maiv ei jienv yie mbuox nyei waac dorng zuangx bun mienh taaih yie cing-nzengc.” (Naaiv norm wuom cuotv nyei dorngx se Me^li^mbaa Wuom, yiem Sin Deic-Bung-Huaang, Kaa^ndetc Deic.)
27.3: “Yie mbuo nyei die yiem wuov deic-bung-huaang daic mi'aqv. Ninh yaac maiv maaih dorn. Ninh maiv caux gan Kolaa wuov deix gapv zunv ngaengc Ziouv.  Ninh daic se weic ninh ganh nyei zuiz.
27.7: “Se^lo^fe^hatc nyei sieqv gorngv duqv horpc nyei. Meih zungv oix zuqc yiem ninh mbuo nyei die nyei muoz-doic mbu'ndongx paaiv ndau bun ninh mbuo nzipc. Zorqv ninh mbuo nyei die nzipc nyei buonc jiu bun ninh mbuo.
27.10: Se gorngv maiv maaih gorx, maiv maaih youz, oix zuqc jiu bun ninh nyei baeqv fai die nyei youz nzipc.
27.2: Naaiv deix biaa muoz-sieqv mingh taux Wuic Buangh Ndopv-Liuh nyei gaengh ndaangc, souv jienv Mose caux E^le^aa^saa sai mienh caux zuangx bieiv zeiv caux gapv zunv nyei zuangx mienh nyei nza'hmien gorngv,
27.1: Se^lo^fe^hatc nyei biaa dauh sieqv nyei mbuox maaih hnangv naaiv, Maa^haa^laa, Noyaa, Hokv^laa, Minkaa caux Ti^laa^saa. Se^lo^fe^hatc se Hefe nyei dorn, Hefe se Gi^le^aatc nyei dorn, Gi^le^aatc se Maa^ki^le nyei dorn, Maa^ki^le se Maa^natv^se nyei dorn, zoux Maa^natv^se Fingx. Maa^natv^se zoux Yosepv nyei dorn.
27.8: “Mbuox I^saa^laa^en Mienh ‘Se gorngv maaih dauh m'jangc dorn daic mi'aqv, ninh yaac maiv maaih dorn, oix zuqc zorqv ninh nzipc nyei buonc jiu bun ninh nyei sieqv nzipc.
27.11: Se gorngv ninh nyei die maiv maaih gorx, maiv maaih youz, oix zuqc zorqv ninh nzipc nyei buonc jiu bun caux ninh juangc fingx gauh cien jiex wuov dauh, benx wuov dauh nzipc nyei buonc. Naaiv se I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei leiz-latc caux leiz ziux Ziouv paaiv Mose nor.’+”
27.16: “Ziouv,  maanc mienh nyei lingh wuonh nyei Tin-Hungh aac, tov orn dauh mienh gunv naaiv deix zuangx mienh,

14.21: Mv baac yie za'gengh ziangh jienv, yie nyei njang-laangc yaac oix buangv nzengc lungh ndiev. Naaiv i nyungc se zien haic. Ndongc naaiv deix zien
14.15: Se gorngv Ziouv zoux yietc nzunc daix nzengc naaiv deix I^saa^laa^en Mienh, beiv daix yietc dauh mienh, fingx-fingx haiz meih hnangv naaiv nor zoux ninh mbuo ziouc gorngv,
14.23: Ninh mbuo ziouc yietc liuz maiv duqv bieqc yie laengz bun ninh mbuo nyei ong-taaix nyei deic-bung. Mangc piex yie wuov deix maiv maaih yietc dauh duqv buatc.
14.20: Ziouv  dau, “Ziux meih tov nyei waac yie guangc ninh mbuo nyei zuiz.
14.18: Meih gorngv, ‘Ziouv  maiv qiex jiez siepv, ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh, guangc mienh nyei zuiz caux mienh ngaengc Ziouv  nyei sic. Mv baac maiv zeiz maiv bun zuqc dingc zuiz, zungv dingc diex maac nyei zuiz njiec taux buo biei doic fun-faqv.’
14.33: Meih mbuo nyei fu'jueiv oix zuqc yiem naaiv zoux mangc yungh nyei mienh. Se laaix meih mbuo maiv ziepc zuoqv, ninh mbuo cingx zuqc siouc kouv buangv feix ziepc hnyangx, zuov taux meih mbuo dauh dauh daic nzengc.
14.43: weic zuqc Aa^maa^lekv Mienh caux Kaa^naa^an Mienh yiem meih mbuo nyei wuov ndaangc maengx. Meih mbuo oix zuqc ninh mbuo nyei nzuqc ndaauv daix. Ziouv maiv caux meih mbuo yiem weic zuqc meih mbuo huin nqaang, maiv gan jienv Ziouv.  ”
14.22: se yie houv jienv naaiv deix mienh, maiv maaih yietc dauh duqv ziangh jienv taux bieqc wuov norm deic-bung. Ninh mbuo buatc jiex yie nyei njang-laangc, yaac buatc jiex yie yiem I^yipv Deic-Bung caux deic-bung-huaang zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei jangx-hoc, mv baac ninh mbuo seix yie ziepc nzunc, yaac maiv muangx yie nyei waac.
14.42: Maiv dungx mingh weic zuqc Ziouv  maiv caux meih mbuo yiem. Meih mbuo ziouc zuqc win-wangv daix meih mbuo,
14.31: Mv baac meih mbuo nyei fu'jueiv, dongh meih mbuo gorngv oix zuqc caangv mingh, yie oix dorh bieqc meih mbuo nqemh wuov norm deic-bung. Wuov norm deic-bung ziouc benx ninh mbuo nyei mi'aqv.
14.4: Laanh yaac mbuox laanh, “Mbuo ginv dauh zoux bieiv zeiv dorh mbuo nzuonx I^yipv Deic-Bung orqc?”
14.29: Ei saauv mienh wuov zanc, yiem nyic ziepc hnyangx faaux maengx nyei mienh, dongh ngopv yie wuov deix, zungv oix zuqc yiem naaiv deic-bung-huaang ndortv nzengc.
14.9: Mv baac maiv dungx ngaengc Ziouv,  yaac maiv dungx gamh nziex yiem wuov norm deic-bung nyei mienh. Mbuo hungh hec mborqv hingh ninh mbuo. Nzie ninh mbuo wuov nyungc qaqv zitc mi'aqv. Ziouv  yaac caux mbuo yiem. Maiv dungx gamh nziex ninh mbuo maah!”
14.37: se nzuonx daaih zunh waaic nyei fienx gorngv doqc wuov norm deic-bung wuov deix, zuqc Ziouv bun ninh mbuo butv domh wuon-baengc daic nzengc mi'aqv.
14.5: Mose caux Aalon ziouc mbaapv njiec I^saa^laa^en zuangx mienh gapv zunv nyei dorngx nza'hmien.
14.3: Ziouv weic haaix diuc dorh yie mbuo taux naaiv norm deic-bung zuqc nzuqc ndaauv daix? Liemh yie mbuo nyei auv-jueiv yaac oix zuqc caangv mingh. Yie mbuo nzuonx I^yipv Deic-Bung zungv gauh longx maiv zeiz?”
14.39: Mose gorngv naaiv deix jauv-louc bun I^saa^laa^en nyei zuangx mienh muangx. Baeqc fingx ziouc nzauh haic, qaqv nyiemv.
14.6: Nun nyei dorn, Yo^su^waa, caux Ye^fun^ne nyei dorn, Kaalepv, dongh mingh zaah deic-bung nyei i dauh, nzauh haic ziouc betv ganh nyei lui,
14.8: Se gorngv Ziouv horpc hnyouv mbuo nor, ninh haih dorh mbuo bieqc wuov norm deic-bung, yaac zorqv wuov norm deic-bung bun mbuo. Se ndau-touv longx nyei deic-bung.
14.7: yaac gorngv mbuox zuangx mienh, “Yie mbuo mingh youh zaah gormx wuov norm deic-bung, buatc deic-bung za'gengh! longx haic.
14.32: Mv baac meih mbuo aeqv, oix zuqc yiem naaiv deic-bung-huaang ndortv nzengc.
14.25: Weic zuqc Aa^maa^lekv Mienh caux Kaa^naa^an Mienh yiem wuov deix horngc zaangc nyei dorngx, njang hnoi meih mbuo oix zuqc daaux sin cuotv jauv hungx jienv deic-bung-huaang, gan Koiv-Siqv wuov diuh jauv mingh.”
14.17: “Ziouv  aac, ih zanc tov bun meih nyei domh qaqv biux mengh cuotv daaih ziux meih gorngv jiex nyei waac.
14.12: Yie oix bun ninh mbuo butv domh wuon-baengc mietc ninh mbuo, bun ninh mbuo maiv duqv nzipc wuov norm deic-bung. Mv baac yie oix bun meih zoux yietc fingx nyei ong-taaix. Wuov fingx oix zoux gauh hlo, gauh henv ninh mbuo nyei fingx.”
14.34: Meih mbuo oix zuqc siouc meih mbuo ganh nyei zuiz buangv feix ziepc hnyangx. Ziux mingh zaah deic-bung wuov deix feix ziepc hnoi, oix zuqc yietc hnyangx div yietc hnoi. Meih mbuo ziouc hiuv duqv yie maiv horpc hnyouv meih mbuo se hnangv haaix nor.”+’
14.30: Cuotv liuz Ye^fun^ne nyei dorn, Kaalepv, caux Nun nyei dorn, Yo^su^waa, maiv maaih yietc dauh haih duqv bieqc yie houv bun ninh mbuo yiem wuov norm deic-bung.
14.11: Ziouv  mbuox Mose, “Naaiv deix mienh oix mangc piex yie taux haaix zanc? Maiv gunv yie yiem ninh mbuo mbu'ndongx zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei jangx-hoc ndongc naaic camv, ninh mbuo corc oix ngaengc jienv maiv sienx yie taux haaix zanc?
14.28: Weic naaiv oix zuqc mbuox ninh mbuo, ‘Ziouv gorngv, “Yie ziangh jienv yie ganh nyei maengc gorngv, ziux haiz meih mbuo gorngv nyei waac yie zungv oix zoux bun meih mbuo aqv.
14.44: Mv baac zuangx mienh gaamv faaux mbong hlang deix nyei dorngx mingh maiv gunv Mose caux Ziouv  nyei Laengz Ngaengc Waac Faang maiv cuotv ndopv-liuh ciangv.
14.45: Yiem wuov mbong nyei Aa^maa^lekv Mienh caux Kaa^naa^an Mienh ziouc njiec daaih mborqv hingh, zunc ninh mbuo taux Homaa Deic.
14.19: Ziouv  aac, ziux meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv haic mienh, tov guangc nqoi naaiv deix mienh nyei zuiz, hnangv ninh mbuo yiem I^yipv Deic-Bung cuotv daaih taux ih zanc meih guangc ninh mbuo nyei zuiz wuov nor.”
14.35: Yie, Ziouv,  gorngv liuz aqv. Yie ndongc haaix zungv oix hnangv naaiv nor zoux bun naaiv deix waaic haic nyei zuangx mienh, dongh gapv hnyouv caux yie doix-dekc nyei mienh. Ninh mbuo oix zuqc yiem naaiv deic-bung-huaang buangh zuqc ninh mbuo nyei setv mueiz hnoi. Oix zuqc yiem naaiv daic nzengc aqv.”
14.41: Mv baac Mose gorngv, “Meih mbuo weic haaix diuc ngaengc Ziouv nyei lingc? Meih mbuo maiv haih zoux maiv ziangh sic.
14.13: Mose gorngv mbuox Ziouv,  “Meih longc meih nyei domh qaqv dorh naaiv deix mienh yiem I^yipv Mienh mbu'ndongx cuotv daaih. I^yipv Mienh haiz meih daix meih nyei mienh,
14.40: Da'nyeic ndorm nziouv nyei, ninh mbuo faaux mbong hlang deix nyei dorngx mingh gorngv, “Yie mbuo ih zanc oix mingh bieqc Ziouv laengz bun nyei dorngx. Yie mbuo baamz zuiz mi'aqv.”
14.26: Ziouv gorngv mbuox Mose caux Aalon,
14.14: ninh mbuo ziouc mbuox yiem jienv naaiv norm deic-bung nyei mienh. O Ziouv  aac, naaiv norm deic-bung nyei mienh zungv haiz gorngv meih caux naaiv deix mienh yiem. Meih hmien doix hmien bun mienh buatc jiex. Meih nyei mbuonx yiem jienv ninh mbuo gu'nguaaic. Lungh hnoi zanc Ziouv yiem mbuonx-ndiouh dorh ninh mbuo. Lungh muonz zanc yiem douz-ndiouh.
14.27: “Naaiv deix orqv haic nyei zuangx mienh oix ngopv yie taux haaix zanc? Yie haiz naaiv deix I^saa^laa^en Mienh ngopv yie, guaix yie.
14.38: Mingh zaah deic-bung nyei mienh kungx maaih Nun nyei dorn, Yo^su^waa, caux Ye^fun^ne nyei dorn, Kaalepv, maaih maengc ziangh hnangv.
14.36: Mose paaiv mingh zaah deic-bung nyei mienh nzuonx daaih gorngv doqc deic-bung nyei jauv-louc nduov zuangx mienh guaix ninh,
14.10: Zuangx mienh ziouc gorngv oix zorqv la'bieiv zong daic ninh mbuo. Wuov zanc, Ziouv  nyei njang-laangc hinc cuotv daaih yiem Wuic Buangh nyei Ndopv-Liuh, bun I^saa^laa^en nyei zuangx mienh buatc.
14.2: I^saa^laa^en nyei zuangx mienh ngopv Mose caux Aalon. Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Feix duqv yie mbuo yiem I^yipv Deic-Bung daic, fai yiem naaiv deic-bung-huaang daic maiv zei!
14.1: Wuov muonz zuangx mienh qaqv nyiemv mbui nyei.
14.24: Mv baac yie nyei bou, Kaalepv, nyei hnyouv caux wuov deix maiv fih hnangv. Ninh yaac gan nzengc yie. Yie ziouc oix dorh ninh bieqc ninh zaah liuz wuov norm deic-bung. Ninh nyei zeiv-fun yaac oix duqv nzipc.
14.16: ‘Ziouv  maiv maaih banh zeic dorh naaiv deix mienh bieqc ninh houv bun ninh mbuo wuov norm deic-bung, ziouc yiem wuov deic-bung-huaang daix nzengc ninh mbuo.’

3.21: Geson nyei bungh buonc se Lipv^ni caux Si^me^i Mienh. Naaiv se Geson Mienh nyei bungh buonc.
3.15: “Oix zuqc saauv Lewi Mienh ziux ninh mbuo nyei bungh buonc, ziux ninh mbuo nyei mienh buonc. Da'faanh buangv hlaax faaux maengx nyei m'jangc dorn, oix zuqc saauv nzengc.”
3.23: Geson Mienh nyei bungh buonc oix zuqc corng ganh nyei ndopv-liuh yiem Wuic Buangh nyei Ndopv-Liuh nqa'haav maengx, fai bung wuov.
3.47: Yietc dauh oix zuqc cuotv yietc lungz faam-zinh nyaanh ziux singx dinc dingc daaih nyei hniev-daauh.
3.20: Me^laa^li nyei dorn ziux ninh mbuo nyei bungh buonc benx Maali caux Musi Mienh. Naaiv se Lewi Fingx ziux ninh mbuo nyei bungh buonc.
3.18: Geson nyei dorn ziux ninh mbuo nyei bungh buonc maaih Lipv^ni caux Si^me^i Mienh.
3.33: Me^laa^li nyei bungh buonc maaih Maali caux Musi Mienh. Naaiv se Me^laa^li Mienh nyei bungh buonc.
3.43: Ziux faaux mbuox nyei soux mouc, maaih i waanc i cin nyic baeqv cietv ziepc faam dauh yietc hlaax faaux maengx nyei daauh dauh dorn.
3.48: Zuoqc zengc njiec naaiv deix mienh nyei nyaanh oix zuqc jiu bun Aalon caux ninh nyei dorn mbuo.”
3.22: Yiem yietc hlaax faaux maengx nyei m'jangc dorn yietc zungv maaih siec cin hmz baeqv dauh.
3.42: Mose ziouc ziux Ziouv  paaiv nyei waac saauv nzengc I^saa^laa^en nyei zuangx mienh yungz nyei daauh dauh dorn.
3.50: Yiem I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei dorn-la'gauv ninh duqv nduoh joih nyic ziepc hmz lungz nyaanh ziux singx dinc dingc daaih nyei hniev-daauh.
3.31: Ninh mbuo oix zuqc goux Laengz Ngaengc Waac Faang, dieh, dang-jaax, ziec-dorngh caux buov hung dieh, aengx caux yietc zungv yiem singx dinc longc nyei jaa-sic, liemh mbaeqc gaengh ndie. Da'faanh naaiv buoqv ga'naaiv qiemx longc nyei yietc zungv se yiem ninh mbuo liuc leiz nzengc.
3.4: Mv baac yiem Sinaai Deic-Bung-Huaang wuov zanc, Naa^ndapc caux Aa^mbi^hu longc maiv maaih leiz longc nyei douz ziec bun Ziouv ziouc zuqc yiem Ziouv  nyei nza'hmien daic mi'aqv. Ninh mbuo maiv maaih dorn-jueiv. Hnangv naaic, Aalon ziangh jienv nyei ziangh hoc, kungx maaih E^le^aa^saa caux I^taa^maa zoux sai mienh nyei gong hnangv.
3.29: Ko^haatv Mienh nyei bungh buonc oix zuqc corng ganh nyei ndopv-liuh yiem Wuic Buangh Ndopv-Liuh nyei naamh bung maengx.
3.9: Oix zuqc zorqv Lewi Mienh jiu bun Aalon caux ninh nyei dorn mbuo. Yiem I^saa^laa^en Mienh mbu'ndongx se dongh naaiv deix oix zuqc jiu nzengc bun Aalon.
3.37: Liemh laatc dongc, dongc nyei taapv, mborng ndau corng laatc ndie nyei dongc caux hlaang yaac oix zuqc goux.
3.3: Naaiv se Aalon nyei dorn nyei mbuox, dongh Mose longc youh orn daaih zoux sai mienh, paaiv zoux sai mienh nyei gong.
3.39: Mose caux Aalon ei Ziouv  paaiv nyei waac saauv Lewi Mienh. Ziux bungh buonc dauh dauh buangv hlaax faaux maengx nyei m'jangc dorn yietc zungv maaih i waanc i cin dauh.
3.6: “Oix zuqc dorh Lewi Fingx daaih jiu bun Aalon sai mienh weic tengx ninh.
3.8: Ninh mbuo oix zuqc goux Wuic Buangh Ndopv-Liuh nyei yietc zungv jaa-sic yaac weic I^saa^laa^en Mienh zoux ndopv-liuh nyei gong.
3.46: I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei dorn-la'gauv gauh camv Lewi Mienh nyei nyic baeqv cietv ziepc faam dauh. Zengc njiec naaiv deix, oix zuqc zuoqc.
3.7: Ninh mbuo oix zuqc yiem Wuic Buangh nyei Ndopv-Liuh weic Aalon yaac weic zuangx baeqc fingx zoux ndopv-liuh nyei gong.
3.32: Maaih Aalon sai mienh nyei dorn, E^le^aa^saa, zoux Lewi Mienh gauh hlo jiex nyei bieiv zeiv yaac gunv goux singx dinc wuov deix mienh.
3.25: Yiem Wuic Buangh Ndopv-Liuh, Geson Mienh oix zuqc goux gomv ndopv-liuh gu'nyuoz wuov yiemc caux ga'nyiec wuov yiemc, aengx goux gomv gu'nguaaic nyei ndopv, bieqc Wuic Buangh Ndopv-Liuh nyei mbaeqc gaengh ndie,
3.17: Naaiv se Lewi nyei dorn nyei mbuox. Maaih Geson, Ko^haatv caux Me^laa^li.
3.12: “Yiem I^saa^laa^en nyei zuangx mienh gu'nyuoz yie ginv cuotv Lewi Mienh weic div I^saa^laa^en nyei yietc zungv m'sieqv dorn yungz nyei daauh dauh dorn. Lewi Mienh benx yie nyei,
3.34: Yiem yietc hlaax faaux maengx nyei m'jangc dorn yietc zungv maaih juqv cin nyic baeqv dauh.
3.30: Utc^si^en nyei dorn, E^li^saa^faan, zoux Ko^haatv Mienh nyei bungh buonc bieiv zeiv.
3.28: Yiem yietc hlaax faaux maengx nyei yietc zungv m'jangc dorn maaih hietc cin luoqc baeqv dauh. Ko^haatv Mienh nyei gong se oix zuqc goux singx dinc.
3.45: “Oix zuqc zorqv Lewi Mienh fungx bun yie div I^saa^laa^en Mienh yungz nyei yietc zungv dorn-la'gauv, yaac longc Lewi Mienh nyei saeng-kuv div I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei saeng-kuv. Lewi Mienh oix zuqc benx yie nyei. Yie se Ziouv.
3.19: Ko^haatv nyei dorn ziux ninh mbuo nyei bungh buonc maaih Amlaam, Itc^haa, He^mbo^lon caux Utc^si^en Mienh.
3.35: Aa^mbi^haa^in nyei dorn, Sux^li^en, zoux Me^laa^li Mienh nyei bungh buonc bieiv zeiv. Ninh mbuo oix zuqc corng ganh nyei ndopv-liuh yiem Wuic Buangh Ndopv-Liuh nyei baqv bung maengx.
3.41: Meih mbuo oix zuqc ginv Lewi Mienh bun yie weic div I^saa^laa^en Mienh yungz nyei yietc zungv daauh dauh dorn. Lewi Mienh nyei saeng-kuv yaac oix zuqc longc div I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei yietc zungv saeng-kuv njiec nyei daauh toi dorn. Yie se Ziouv.  ”
3.13: weic zuqc dauh dauh dorn-la'gauv benx yie nyei. Yiem I^yipv Deic-Bung yie daix mouz dauh dorn-la'gauv wuov zanc, yie ginv cuotv liemh mienh liemh saeng-kuv nyei daauh dauh dorn benx nzengc yie nyei. Ninh mbuo oix zuqc benx yie nyei. Yie se Ziouv.  ”
3.40: Ziouv  gorngv mbuox Mose, “Oix zuqc saauv nzengc I^saa^laa^en Mienh yungz daaih buangv hlaax faaux maengx nyei daauh dauh dorn. Oix zuqc fiev jienv mouz dauh nyei mbuox.
3.26: weih gormx ndopv-liuh caux ziec-dorngh mbaeqc laatc caux mbaeqc laatc gaengh nyei ndie. Liemh hlaang aengx caux naaiv buoqv ga'naaiv yietc zungv se ninh mbuo oix zuqc liuc leiz.
3.14: Yiem Sinaai Deic-Bung-Huaang, Ziouv  gorngv mbuox Mose,
3.27: Ko^haatv nyei bungh buonc maaih Amlaam, Itc^haa, He^mbo^lon caux Utc^si^en Mienh. Naaiv se Ko^haatv Mienh nyei bungh buonc.
3.38: Mose caux Aalon caux Aalon nyei dorn mbuo oix zuqc corng ganh nyei ndopv-liuh yiem zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei ndopv-liuh nyei dong bung maengx, mba'hnoi cuotv wuov bung, se yiem Wuic Buangh nyei Ndopv-Liuh nza'hmien. Ninh mbuo oix zuqc weic I^saa^laa^en Mienh goux singx dinc. Cuotv liuz naaiv deix, haaix dauh mingh fatv singx dinc, oix zuqc daix daic.
3.49: Mose ziouc siou dongh Lewi Mienh div liuz zengc njiec wuov deix I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei zuoqc mienh nyaanh.
3.36: Paaiv bun Me^laa^li Mienh zoux nyei gong se oix zuqc goux ndopv-liuh nyei qorng, gungh gangc ndiangx, dongc, taapv, caux yietc zungv zoux qorng nyei ga'naaiv. Da'faanh naaiv buoqv ga'naaiv qiemx longc nyei nyungc-nyungc se yiem ninh mbuo liuc leiz.
3.10: Oix zuqc orn Aalon caux ninh nyei dorn mbuo zoux sai mienh nyei gong. Cuotv liuz naaiv deix, maaih haaix dauh mingh fatv singx dinc, wuov dauh oix zuqc daix daic.”
3.2: Aalon nyei dorn nyei mbuox maaih hnangv naaiv. Dorn-hlo heuc Naa^ndapc yaac maaih Aa^mbi^hu, E^le^aa^saa, caux I^taa^maa.
3.1: Naaiv se Aalon caux Mose nyei ziex doic mienh, doix Mose yiem Sinaai Mbong, Ziouv  caux ninh gorngv waac nyei ziangh hoc.
3.24: Laa^en nyei dorn, E^li^yaa^saapc, zoux Geson Mienh nyei bungh buonc bieiv zeiv.
3.16: Mose ziouc ei jienv Ziouv  nyei waac saauv ninh mbuo, hnangv Ziouv paaiv ninh zoux nor.
3.51: Mose ziouc ziux Ziouv  paaiv nyei waac zorqv naaiv deix zuoqc mienh nyei nyaanh fungx bun Aalon caux ninh nyei dorn mbuo.

7.88: Longc ziec weic jiu tong nyei saeng-kuv yietc zungv maaih nyic ziepc feix dauh ngongh gouv, luoqc ziepc dauh ba'gi yungh gouv, luoqc ziepc dauh yungh gouv, luoqc ziepc dauh doix hnyangx nyei ba'gi yungh gouv dorn. Naaiv se longc youh dox ziec-dorngh fungx bun Ziouv liuz, fongc horc ziec nyei ga'naaiv.
7.83: Ninh mbuo hnangv naaiv nor yietc fingx yietc fingx nyei dorh ga'naaiv daaih fongc horc. Da'yietv hnoi Yu^ndaa Fingx Am^mi^naa^ndapc nyei dorn, Naason Da'nyeic hnoi Itc^saax^kaa Fingx Zu^aa nyei dorn, Ne^tan^en Da'faam hnoi Se^mbu^lun Fingx Helon nyei dorn, E^li^apc Da'feix hnoi Lu^mben Fingx Se^nde^e nyei dorn, E^li^su Da'hmz hnoi Si^me^on Fingx Sux^li^satv^ndai nyei dorn, Se^lu^mi^en Da'luoqc hnoi Gaatc Fingx Nde^u^en nyei dorn, E^li^yaa^saapc Da'cietv hnoi E^faa^im Fingx Am^mi^hutv nyei dorn, E^li^saa^maa Da'betv hnoi Maa^natv^se Fingx Be^ndaa^su nyei dorn, Gaa^maa^li^en Da'juov hnoi Mben^yaa^min Fingx Gi^nde^o^ni nyei dorn, Aa^mbi^ndan Da'ziepc hnoi Ndaan Fingx Am^mi^qatv^ndai nyei dorn, Aa^hi^ye^se Ziepc Yietv wuov hnoi Aa^se Fingx Okaan nyei dorn, Baa^gi^en Ziepc Nyeic wuov hnoi Napv^taa^li Fingx Enan nyei dorn, Aa^hi^laa Dauh dauh dorh daaih fongc horc nyei ga'naaiv fih hnangv nzengc. Yietc dauh yietc dauh nyei maaih hnangv naaiv. Maaih yietc norm nyaanh bienh, hniev-daauh faah ziepc betv lungz, maaih yietc norm nyaanh nzormc, hniev-daauh nyic ziepc yietv lungz, ziux singx dinc dingc daaih nyei hniev-daauh. I norm zungv zaangh buangv zorpc jienv youh nyei mbuonv-muonc weic zoux fongc horc ziec nyei laangh ziqc. Aengx maaih norm jiem-hungh louh, hniev-daauh faam-lungz, zaangh buangv hung. Aengx maaih yietc dauh ngongh gouv caan, yietc dauh ba'gi yungh gouv, caux yietc dauh doix hnyangx nyei ba'gi yungh dorn weic zoux buov ziec nyei ga'naaiv. Maaih dauh yungh gouv weic ziec fiqv zuiz, maaih i dauh ngongh gouv, biaa dauh ba'gi yungh gouv, biaa dauh yungh gouv caux biaa dauh doix hnyangx nyei ba'gi yungh gouv ziec weic jiu tong.
7.5: “Oix zuqc zipv ninh mbuo fongc horc nyei ga'naaiv longc zoux Wuic Buangh Ndopv-Liuh nyei gong. Oix zuqc jiu bun Lewi Mienh ziux gorqv-mienh nyei gong qiemx longc.”
7.89: Mose bieqc Wuic Buangh nyei Ndopv-Liuh caux Ziouv  gorngv waac wuov zanc, ninh haiz qiex yiem Laengz Ngaengc Waac nyei faang-nqaaix, wuov deix i dauh ke^lu^mbim mbu'ndongx, caux ninh gorngv waac.
7.11: Ziouv gorngv mbuox Mose, “Wuov deix bieiv zeiv oix zuqc yietc hnoi daaih dauh weic fongc horc ninh mbuo nyei ga'naaiv houc ziec-dorngh.”
7.85: Yietc norm nyaanh bienh maaih faah ziepc feix lungz, yietc norm nzormc maaih ziepc betv lungz. Naaiv deix nyaanh jaa-dorngx yietc zungv maaih ziepc cietv joih ziepc feix lungz ziux singx dinc dingc daaih nyei hniev-daauh.
7.3: Ninh mbuo dorh daaih fongc horc bun Ziouv nyei zingh nyeic maaih juqv jaax ngongh cie gomv jienv liuh nyei, caux ziepc nyeic dauh yangh ngongh gouv. I dauh bieiv zeiv fongc horc yietc jaax ngongh cie. Yietc dauh bieiv zeiv fongc horc yietc dauh ngongh. Naaiv deix ga'naaiv ninh mbuo dorh taux zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei ndopv-liuh daaih fongc horc.
7.84: Longc youh dox ziec-dorngh weic fungx bun Ziouv nyei hnoi-nyieqc, naaiv se I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei bieiv zeiv dorh daaih fongc horc houc ziec-dorngh nyei ga'naaiv. Ninh mbuo dorh ziepc nyeic norm nyaanh bienh, ziepc nyeic norm nyaanh nzormc, ziepc nyeic norm jiem-ba'gen.
7.87: Buov ziec nyei saeng-kuv yietc zungv maaih ziepc nyeic dauh ngongh gouv, ziepc nyeic dauh ba'gi yungh gouv, ziepc nyeic dauh doix hnyangx nyei ba'gi yungh gouv, caux jienv laangh ziqc yietc njiec ziec. Maaih ziepc nyeic dauh yungh gouv ziec fiqv zuiz.
7.86: Maaih ziepc nyeic norm jiem-ba'gen, yietc norm maaih faam-lungz ziux singx dinc dingc daaih nyei hniev-daauh. Yaac zaangh buangv hung. Jiem-ba'gen yietc zungv maaih faah ziepc luoqc lungz.
7.10: Longc cing-nzengc youh nzaatv ziec-dorngh bun ziec-dorngh cing-nzengc wuov deix hnoi-nyieqc, bieiv zeiv dorh ga'naaiv daaih yiem wuov ziec-dorngh fongc horc.
7.2: I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei bungh buonc bieiv zeiv, dongh liuc leiz saauv mienh wuov deix bieiv zeiv, ziouc dorh ga'naaiv daaih fongc horc.
7.1: Mose liepc ziangx zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei ndopv-liuh wuov hnoi, ninh longc cing-nzengc youh guoqv jienv bun ndopv-liuh caux ndopv-liuh nyei yietc zungv jaa-sic cing-nzengc. Ninh aengx longc wuov nyungc youh guoqv jienv bun ziec-dorngh caux ziec-dorngh nyei yietc zungv jaa-sic cing-nzengc.
7.6: Mose ziouc zorqv ngongh cie caux ngongh jiu bun Lewi Mienh.
7.8: Aengx zorqv biei jaax cie caux hietc dauh ngongh bun Me^laa^li Mienh ziux ninh mbuo zoux nyei gong qiemx longc nyei. Ninh mbuo yietc zungv yiem Aalon sai mienh nyei dorn, I^taa^maa, nyei buoz-ndiev.
7.9: Mv baac cie caux ngongh Mose maiv bun Ko^haatv Mienh weic zuqc ninh mbuo zoux nyei gong se oix zuqc longc mba'dauh gaeng cing-nzengc nyei ga'naaiv.
7.7: Ninh zorqv i jaax cie caux biei dauh ngongh bun Geson Mienh ziux ninh mbuo zoux nyei gong qiemx longc nyei.

36.12: Ninh mbuo longc Yosepv nyei dorn, Maa^natv^se nyei fun-faqv wuov fingx nyei mienh. Hnangv naaic ninh mbuo duqv nzipc nyei buonc corc yiem ninh mbuo nyei die wuov fingx gu'nyuoz.
36.13: Naaiv se Ziouv  yiem Mo^apc ndau-baengh, Jor^ndaen Ndaaih hlen, Ye^li^ko Zingh doix-ngaanc longc Mose hatc nyei lingc caux leiz-latc.
36.5: Mose ziouc ziux Ziouv nyei waac mbuox I^saa^laa^en Mienh, “Yosepv nyei bungh buonc gorngv duqv horpc aqv.
36.11: Se^lo^fe^hatc nyei sieqv, Maa^haa^laa, Ti^laa^saa, Hokv^laa, Minkaa caux Noyaa, yietc zungv caux ninh mbuo nyei baeqv-muoz doic dorng jaa.
36.3: Se gorngv naaiv deix sieqv caux ganh fingx I^saa^laa^en Mienh dorng jaa, ninh mbuo nzipc nyei buonc ziouc yiem yie mbuo nyei ong-taaix nzipc nyei buonc zorqv cuotv mi'aqv, tim bieqc ninh mbuo nyei nqox wuov bung. Yie mbuo nyei ong-taaix nzipc nyei buonc ziouc zoqc njiec aqv.
36.10: Ziouv  hnangv haaix nor mbuox Mose, Se^lo^fe^hatc nyei sieqv ziouc hnangv wuov nor zoux.
36.2: Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Ziouv  paaiv meih, yie mbuo nyei ziouv, dingc maengc mangc bun nqoi ndau I^saa^laa^en Mienh nzipc wuov zanc, ninh heuc meih zorqv yie mbuo nyei gorx-youz, Se^lo^fe^hatc, nyei buonc bun ninh nyei zuangx sieqv nzipc.
36.1: Gi^le^aatc se Maa^ki^le nyei dorn, Maa^ki^le se Maa^natv^se nyei dorn, Maa^natv^se se Yosepv nyei dorn. Gi^le^aatc nyei bungh buonc bieiv zeiv daaih lorz Mose caux zuangx bieiv zeiv, dongh fingx-fingx I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei bieiv zeiv.
36.4: Taux I^saa^laa^en Mienh Houc nyei Hnyangx wuov hnyangx, sieqv nzipc nyei buonc ziouc tim bieqc ninh dorng jaa wuov fingx mi'aqv. Hnangv naaic ninh mbuo duqv nyei buonc ziouc yiem yie mbuo nyei ong-taaix nzipc nyei buonc zorqv cuotv mingh.”
36.6: Ziouv  hnangv naaiv nor paaiv Se^lo^fe^hatc nyei zuangx sieqv. Ninh mbuo sueih binc caux haaix dauh dorng jaa yaac duqv, mv baac kungx oix zuqc longc die wuov fingx mienh hnangv.
36.8: Maiv gunv haaix fingx I^saa^laa^en Mienh, haaix dauh sieqv duqv nzipc ndau, oix zuqc longc die wuov fingx mienh dorng jaa weic bun mouz dauh I^saa^laa^en Mienh duqv siouc yiem ong-taaix nzipc nyei buonc.
36.9: Hnangv naaiv, meih mbuo nzipc nyei maiv maaih yiem naaiv fingx suiv bieqc ganh fingx, weic zuqc fingx-fingx I^saa^laa^en Mienh oix zuqc goux ninh mbuo nzipc nyei buonc.”
36.7: Hnangv naaic, I^saa^laa^en Mienh nzipc nyei buonc maiv zuqc yiem yietc fingx suiv mingh yiem ganh fingx, weic zuqc I^saa^laa^en Mienh dauh dauh oix zuqc gorqv-mienh goux jienv gorqv-mienh yiem ong-taaix duqv nzipc nyei buonc ndau.

10.21: Jiex daaih, Ko^haatv Mienh cuotv jauv yaac gaeng jienv cing-nzengc nyei ga'naaiv mingh. Ninh mbuo taux dorngx, zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei ndopv-liuh zungv corng ziangx aqv.
10.15: Zu^aa nyei dorn, Ne^tan^en, gunv Itc^saax^kaa Fingx wuov guanh.
10.12: I^saa^laa^en Mienh ziouc cuotv Sinaai Deic-Bung-Huaang, kang jiex kang mingh taux mbuonx dingh njiec Baalaan Deic-Bung-Huaang.
10.17: Caeqv liuz zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei ndopv-liuh, Geson Mienh caux Me^laa^li Mienh, dongh bienh Ndopv-Liuh wuov deix, ziouc cuotv jauv.
10.30: Ho^mbapc dau, “Yie maiv mingh aqv. Yie oix nzuonx yie ganh nyei deic-bung, yie ganh nyei mienh wuov.”
10.20: Yaac maaih Nde^u^en nyei dorn, E^li^yaa^saapc, gunv Gaatc Fingx wuov guanh.
10.4: Se gorngv kungx biomv yietc norm nzatc hnangv, fingx-fingx I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei bieiv zeiv oix zuqc daaih zunv meih naaiv.
10.28: Guanh guanh I^saa^laa^en Mienh cuotv jauv nyei ziangh hoc, oix zuqc hnangv naaiv nor ziux ninh mbuo nyei yietc nyeic mingh.
10.33: I^saa^laa^en Mienh ziouc cuotv Ziouv  nyei mbong mingh buo hnoi nyei jauv. Wuov deix buo hnoi gu'nyuoz Ziouv nyei Laengz Ngaengc Waac Faang mingh ndaangc tengx ninh mbuo lorz dorngx hitv.
10.35: Gaeng Laengz Ngaengc Waac Faang cuotv jauv nyei ziangh hoc, Mose gorngv, “O Ziouv  aah! Jiez daaih maah! Tov bun meih nyei win-wangv faatv nzaanx nzengc. Tov bun nzorng meih wuov deix mienh yiem meih nyei nza'hmien biaux nqoi.”
10.19: Sux^li^satv^ndai nyei dorn, Se^lu^mi^en, gunv Si^me^on Fingx wuov guanh.
10.34: Haaix zanc cuotv jauv, lungh hnoi zanc Ziouv nyei mbuonx yiem ninh mbuo gu'nguaaic.
10.18: Jiex daaih, yiem Lu^mben Mienh nyei ndopv-liuh ciangv nyei guanh guanh cuotv jauv, yaac yiem ninh mbuo nyei geh ga'ndiev. Maaih Se^nde^e nyei dorn, E^li^su, gunv ninh mbuo.
10.22: Jiex daaih, aengx maaih yiem E^faa^im Mienh nyei ndopv-liuh ciangv nyei guanh guanh cuotv jauv, yaac yiem ninh mbuo nyei geh ga'ndiev. Maaih Am^mi^hutv nyei dorn, E^li^saa^maa, gunv ninh mbuo.
10.23: Maaih Be^ndaa^su nyei dorn, Gaa^maa^li^en, gunv Maa^natv^se Fingx wuov guanh.
10.13: Ninh mbuo cuotv naaiv da'yietv nzunc jauv ziux Ziouv  longc Mose mbuox nyei waac.
10.9: Meih mbuo yiem ganh nyei deic-bung yaac maaih win-wangv daaih hoic ziouc cuotv mingh caux ninh mbuo mborqv jaax, oix zuqc longc wuov deix nzatc biomv qiex mbui nyei, beqv nyei. Ziouv,  meih mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh, ziouc jangx meih mbuo, njoux meih mbuo leih ndutv meih mbuo nyei win-wangv.
10.26: Maaih Okaan nyei dorn, Baa^gi^en, gunv Aa^se Fingx wuov guanh.
10.5: Haiz biomv nzatc nyei qiex mbui, beqv nyei, corng ndopv-liuh yiem dong bung maengx wuov deix oix zuqc cuotv jauv.
10.27: Yaac maaih Enan nyei dorn, Aa^hi^laa, gunv Napv^taa^li Fingx wuov guanh.
10.14: Yiem Yu^ndaa Mienh nyei ndopv-liuh ciangv nyei guanh guanh cuotv jauv mingh ndaangc. Ninh mbuo yaac yiem ninh mbuo nyei geh ga'ndiev. Maaih Am^mi^naa^ndapc nyei dorn, Naason, gunv ninh mbuo.
10.3: Biomv i norm nzatc nyei ziangh hoc, zuangx mienh oix zuqc daaih caux meih gapv zunv yiem Wuic Buangh Ndopv-Liuh nyei gaengh ndaangc.
10.7: Weic heuc zuangx mienh daaih zunv oix zuqc biomv nzatc, mv baac maiv dungx biomv mbui nyei, beqv nyei, wuov nyungc qiex.
10.36: Laengz Ngaengc Waac Faang haaix zanc dingh njiec, Mose aengx gorngv, “O Ziouv aac, tov meih nzuonx daaih, caux cin-cin waanc-waanc I^saa^laa^en Mienh yiem.”
10.10: Aengx taux njien-youh nyei ziangh hoc, jiex meih mbuo nyei zipv caux Siang-Hlaax nyei Zipv, dorh ga'naaiv mingh buov ziec, yaac ziec weic jiu tong wuov zanc, oix zuqc biomv naaiv deix nzatc. Naaiv se weic bun meih mbuo nyei Ziouv  jangx zuqc meih mbuo. Yie zoux Ziouv,  meih mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh.”
10.2: “Oix zuqc longc nyaanh daav i norm nzatc. Biomv wuov deix i norm nzatc heuc zuangx mienh gapv zunv, yaac biomv heuc suiv ndopv-liuh ciangv.
10.31: Mose aengx gorngv, “Tov meih maiv dungx guangc yie mbuo oc. Meih hiuv duqv yiem naaiv deic-bung-huaang yie mbuo oix zuqc corng ndopv-liuh ciangv yiem haaix. Meih haih tengx yie mbuo zoux m'zing.
10.6: Haiz biomv da'nyeic nzunc, corng ndopv-liuh yiem naamh bung maengx wuov deix yaac oix zuqc cuotv jauv. Biomv nzatc nyei qiex mbui, beqv nyei, ziouc zoux jangx-hoc bun hiuv duqv oix zuqc cuotv jauv.
10.8: “Se dongh Aalon nyei dorn mbuo wuov deix sai mienh oix zuqc biomv nzatc. Naaiv se meih mbuo doic jiex doic, yietc liuz oix zuqc gan nyei leiz.
10.24: Yaac maaih Gi^nde^o^ni nyei dorn, Aa^mbi^ndan, gunv Mben^yaa^min Fingx wuov guanh.
10.25: Nqa'haav laai, weic tengx guanh guanh mbungh jienv nqa'haav maengx, maaih yiem Ndaan Mienh nyei ndopv-liuh ciangv nyei guanh guanh cuotv jauv, yaac yiem ninh mbuo nyei geh ga'ndiev. Maaih Am^mi^qatv^ndai nyei dorn, Aa^hi^ye^se, gunv.
10.29: Mose caux ninh nyei ong-daa, Mi^ndien Mienh, Le^u^en nyei dorn, Ho^mbapc, gorngv, “Yie mbuo oix cuotv jauv mingh taux Ziouv gorngv, ‘Yie oix jiu bun meih mbuo’ wuov norm dorngx. Tov caux yie mbuo mingh oc. Yie mbuo ziouc zoux longx bun meih weic zuqc Ziouv  laengz ceix longx nyei ga'naaiv bun I^saa^laa^en Mienh.”
10.11: Taux da'nyeic hnyangx, nyeic hlaax, nyic ziepc wuov hnoi, yiem Laengz Ngaengc Waac nyei Ndopv-Liuh gu'nguaaic wuov dorv mbuonx faaux.
10.32: Se gorngv meih caux yie mbuo mingh nor, Ziouv  ceix haaix nyungc longx nyei bun yie mbuo, yie mbuo yaac bun meih caux jienv maaih buonc.”
10.16: Aengx maaih Helon nyei dorn, E^li^apc, gunv Se^mbu^lun Fingx wuov guanh.

2.21: Ninh nyei guanh maaih buo waanc i cin nyic baeqv dauh.
2.15: Ninh nyei guanh maaih biei waanc biaa cin luoqc baeqv hmz ziepc dauh.
2.12: Si^me^on Fingx oix zuqc corng ndopv-liuh nitv jienv Lu^mben Fingx. Si^me^on Fingx nyei bieiv zeiv maaih Sux^li^satv^ndai nyei dorn, Se^lu^mi^en.
2.17: Cuotv jauv nyei ziangh hoc, mingh ndaangc wuov deix i guanh caux nqa'haav mingh wuov deix i guanh mbu'ndongx, oix zuqc maaih Lewi Mienh dorh jienv Wuic Buangh nyei Ndopv-Liuh mingh. Oix zuqc zueih yietv zueih nyeic cuotv jauv ziux guanh guanh corng ninh mbuo nyei ndopv-liuh. Guanh guanh oix zuqc yiem ganh nyei dorngx yaac yiem ganh nyei geh ga'ndiev.
2.30: Ninh nyei guanh maaih biaa waanc buo cin feix baeqv dauh.
2.20: Maa^natv^se Fingx oix zuqc corng ndopv-liuh nitv jienv E^faa^im Fingx. Maa^natv^se Fingx nyei bieiv zeiv maaih Be^ndaa^su nyei dorn, Gaa^maa^li^en.
2.4: Ninh nyei guanh maaih siec waanc biei cin luoqc baeqv dauh.
2.28: Ninh nyei guanh maaih biei waanc yietc cin hmz baeqv dauh.
2.33: Mv baac Lewi Mienh maiv duqv saauv bieqc wuov deix I^saa^laa^en Mienh hnangv Ziouv  paaiv Mose nor.
2.19: Ninh nyei guanh maaih biei waanc hmz baeqv dauh.
2.34: I^saa^laa^en Mienh ziouc zoux nzengc ziux Ziouv  paaiv Mose nyei waac. Ninh mbuo hnangv naaiv nor yiem ninh mbuo nyei geh ga'ndiev corng ndopv-liuh. Gorqv-mienh yaac ziux gorqv-mienh nyei fingx hnangv wuov nor cuotv jauv.
2.18: Yiem fai bung maengx, E^faa^im Fingx nyei guanh guanh oix zuqc corng ninh mbuo nyei ndopv-liuh yiem ganh nyei geh ga'ndiev. E^faa^im Fingx nyei bieiv zeiv maaih Am^mi^hutv nyei dorn, E^li^saa^maa.
2.22: Jiex mingh, Mben^yaa^min Fingx oix zuqc corng ndopv-liuh nitv jienv. Mben^yaa^min Fingx nyei bieiv zeiv maaih Gi^nde^o^ni nyei dorn, Aa^mbi^ndan.
2.23: Ninh nyei guanh maaih buo waanc biaa cin feix baeqv dauh.
2.13: Ninh nyei guanh maaih biaa waanc nduoh cin faam-baeqv dauh.
2.9: Bieqc Yu^ndaa wuov bung nyei guanh guanh yietc zungv maaih yietc sinx hietc waanc juqv cin feix baeqv dauh. Cuotv jauv nyei ziangh hoc naaiv deix oix zuqc mingh ndaangc.
2.26: Ninh nyei guanh maaih juqv waanc i cin cietv baeqv dauh.
2.5: Itc^saax^kaa Fingx oix zuqc corng ndopv-liuh nitv jienv Yu^ndaa Fingx. Itc^saax^kaa Fingx nyei bieiv zeiv maaih Zu^aa nyei dorn, Ne^tan^en.
2.27: Aa^se Fingx oix zuqc corng ndopv-liuh nitv jienv Ndaan Fingx. Aa^se Fingx nyei bieiv zeiv maaih Okaan nyei dorn, Baa^gi^en.
2.14: Jiex mingh, Gaatc Fingx oix zuqc corng ndopv-liuh nitv jienv. Gaatc Fingx nyei bieiv zeiv maaih Nde^u^en nyei dorn, E^li^ yaa^saapc.
2.3: Yiem dong bung maengx, mba'hnoi cuotv wuov bung, Yu^ndaa Fingx nyei guanh guanh oix zuqc corng ninh mbuo nyei ndopv-liuh yiem ganh nyei geh ga'ndiev. Yu^ndaa Fingx nyei bieiv zeiv maaih Am^mi^naa^ndapc nyei dorn, Naason.
2.7: Jiex mingh, Se^mbu^lun Fingx oix zuqc corng ndopv-liuh nitv jienv. Se^mbu^lun Fingx nyei bieiv zeiv maaih Helon nyei dorn, E^li^apc.
2.10: Yiem naamh bung maengx, Lu^mben Fingx nyei guanh guanh oix zuqc corng ninh mbuo nyei ndopv-liuh yiem ganh nyei geh ga'ndiev. Lu^mben Fingx nyei bieiv zeiv maaih Se^nde^e nyei dorn, E^li^su.
2.2: “I^saa^laa^en Mienh oix zuqc corng ganh nyei ndopv-liuh huing gormx yaac huin mingh Wuic Buangh nyei Ndopv-Liuh wuov bung, gorqv-mienh yiem gorqv-mienh nyei buonv-fingx geh caux bungh buonc geh ga'ndiev.”
2.1: Ziouv gorngv mbuox Mose caux Aalon,
2.31: Bieqc Ndaan Fingx wuov bung yietc zungv maaih yietc sinx biaa waanc siec cin luoqc baeqv dauh. Cuotv jauv nyei ziangh hoc ninh mbuo zoux nqa'haav laai wuov guanh yaac yiem ganh nyei geh ga'ndiev.
2.6: Ninh nyei guanh maaih biaa waanc biei cin feix baeqv dauh.
2.8: Ninh nyei guanh maaih biaa waanc siec cin feix baeqv dauh.
2.24: Bieqc E^faa^im wuov bung nyei guanh guanh yietc zungv maaih yietc sinx hietc cin yietc baeqv dauh. Cuotv jauv nyei ziangh hoc naaiv guanh zoux da'faam guanh.
2.25: Yiem baqv bung maengx, Ndaan Fingx nyei guanh guanh oix zuqc corng ninh mbuo nyei ndopv-liuh yiem ganh nyei geh ga'ndiev. Ndaan Fingx nyei bieiv zeiv maaih Am^mi^qatv^ndai nyei dorn, Aa^hi^ye^se.
2.29: Jiex mingh, Napv^taa^li Fingx oix zuqc corng ndopv-liuh nitv jienv. Napv^taa^li Fingx nyei bieiv zeiv maaih Enan nyei dorn, Aa^hi^laa.
2.11: Ninh nyei guanh maaih biei waanc juqv cin hmz baeqv dauh.
2.32: Naaiv se I^saa^laa^en Mienh ziux ninh mbuo nyei mienh houz saauv. Yiem ndopv-liuh ciangv ziux ninh mbuo nyei guanh saauv daaih yietc zungv maaih juqv sinx buo cin hmz baeqv hmz ziepc dauh mienh.
2.16: Bieqc Lu^mben wuov bung nyei guanh guanh yietc zungv maaih yietc sinx biaa waanc yietc cin feix baeqv hmz ziepc dauh. Cuotv jauv nyei ziangh hoc naaiv deix zoux da'nyeic guanh.

1.43: Yiem I^saa^laa^en nyei dorn-hlo, Lu^mben, nyei zeiv-fun ziux bungh buonc, ziux mienh buonc, ziux mbuox, ninh mbuo faaux dauh dauh nyic ziepc hnyangx faaux maengx, haih zoux duqv baeng nyei m'jangc dorn nyei soux mouc. Yietc zungv maaih hnangv naaiv. Lu^mben Fingx maaih 46,500 dauh Si^me^on Fingx maaih 59,300 dauh Gaatc Fingx maaih 45,650 dauh Yu^ndaa Fingx maaih 74,600 dauh Itc^saax^kaa Fingx maaih 54,400 dauh Se^mbu^lun Fingx maaih 57,400 dauh E^faa^im Fingx maaih 40,500 dauh Maa^natv^se Fingx maaih 32,200 dauh Mben^yaa^min Fingx maaih 35,400 dauh Ndaan Fingx maaih 62,700 dauh Aa^se Fingx maaih 41,500 dauh Napv^taa^li Fingx maaih 53,400 dauh Yietc zungv maaih 603,550 dauh
1.15: Napv^taa^li Fingx Enan nyei dorn, Aa^hi^laa

1.4: Fingx-fingx oix zuqc maaih dauh zoux ninh mbuo nyei buonv-fingx mienh nyei bieiv zeiv daaih tengx meih mbuo.”
1.44: Naaiv se Mose caux Aalon aengx caux ziepc nyeic fingx nyei ziepc nyeic dauh bieiv zeiv saauv nyei m'jangc dorn.
