1.45: Da'faanh duqv nyic ziepc hnyangx faaux maengx, dauh dauh haih cuotv mingh mborqv jaax nyei I^saa^laa^en Mienh ziux bungh buonc saauv daaih.
1.50: Oix zuqc paaiv Lewi Mienh goux Laengz Ngaengc Waac nyei Ndopv-Liuh, caux ndopv-liuh nyei jaa-sic, aengx caux naaiv norm ndopv-liuh longc nyei yietc zungv ga'naaiv. Ninh mbuo oix zuqc bienh ndopv-liuh caux ndopv-liuh nyei yietc zungv jaa-sic. Yaac oix zuqc goux naaiv norm ndopv-liuh aengx corng ganh nyei ndopv-liuh huing gormx.
1.19: Ziux Ziouv mbuox Mose zoux, ninh yiem Sinaai Deic-Bung-Huaang saauv mienh.
1.54: I^saa^laa^en Mienh ziouc ei Ziouv  mbuox Mose nyei waac hnangv naaiv nor zoux nzengc.
1.18: taux nyeic hlaax, saeng-yietv wuov hnoi, ninh mbuo heuc zuangx mienh gapv zunv ziouc ziux ong-taaix nyei bungh buonc caux mienh buonc faaux mienh houz, yaac ziux dauh dauh duqv nyic ziepc hnyangx faaux maengx nyei m'jangc dorn, yietc dauh yietc dauh nyei faaux mbuox.
1.13: Aa^se Fingx Okaan nyei dorn, Baa^gi^en
1.9: Se^mbu^lun Fingx Helon nyei dorn, E^li^apc
1.52: I^saa^laa^en Mienh oix zuqc corng ganh nyei ndopv-liuh benx yietc guanh yietc guanh nyei, gorqv-mienh yiem gorqv-mienh nyei guanh, yiem ganh nyei fingx nyei geh ga'ndiev.
1.5: Tengx meih wuov deix mienh nyei mbuox maaih hnangv naaiv. Lu^mben Fingx Se^nde^e nyei dorn, E^li^su
1.51: Haaix zanc suiv Laengz Ngaengc Waac nyei Ndopv-Liuh, se Lewi Mienh oix zuqc caeqv. Haaix zanc corng, Lewi Mienh oix zuqc corng. Se gorngv ga'nyiec nyei mienh mingh fatv, oix zuqc bun ninh zuqc daic aqv.
1.14: Gaatc Fingx Nde^u^en nyei dorn, E^li^yaa^saapc
1.3: Meih caux Aalon oix zuqc ziux guanh guanh I^saa^laa^en Mienh faaux mbuox, yiem hnyangx-jeiv nyic ziepc hnyangx gu'nguaaic, haih zoux duqv baeng nyei dauh dauh m'jangc dorn nyei mbuox.
1.49: “Maiv dungx saauv Lewi Fingx. Maiv dungx bun Lewi Fingx caux wuov deix I^saa^laa^en Mienh faaux mienh houz.
1.53: Mv baac Lewi Mienh oix zuqc corng ganh nyei ndopv-liuh huing jienv Laengz Ngaengc Waac nyei Ndopv-Liuh weic maiv bun I^saa^laa^en nyei zuangx mienh zuqc yie nouz. Se Lewi Mienh oix zuqc goux Laengz Ngaengc Waac nyei Ndopv-Liuh.”
1.10: E^faa^im Fingx Am^mi^hutv nyei dorn, E^li^saa^maa Maa^natv^se Fingx Be^ndaa^su nyei dorn, Gaa^maa^li^en
1.2: “Oix zuqc tengx I^saa^laa^en nyei zuangx mienh faaux mienh houz ziux yietc fingx yietc fingx, yietc buonc yietc buonc. Yaac oix zuqc faaux yietc dauh yietc dauh m'jangc dorn nyei mbuox.
1.1: I^saa^laa^en Mienh cuotv I^yipv Deic-Bung nyei da'nyeic hnyangx, nyeic hlaax, saeng-yietv wuov hnoi, yiem Sinaai Deic-Bung-Huaang, Wuic Buangh nyei Ndopv-Liuh wuov, Ziouv  gorngv mbuox Mose,
1.6: Si^me^on Fingx Sux^li^satv^ndai nyei dorn, Se^lu^mi^en
1.8: Itc^saax^kaa Fingx Zu^aa nyei dorn, Ne^tan^en
1.46: Yietc zungv maaih juqv sinx buo cin hmz baeqv hmz ziepc dauh.
1.7: Yu^ndaa Fingx Am^mi^naa^ndapc nyei dorn, Naason
1.47: Mv baac Lewi Fingx nyei mienh buonc maiv duqv caux wuov deix fingx saauv,
1.16: Naaiv deix mienh se zuangx mienh ginv daaih zoux fingx-fingx I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei bieiv zeiv, se dongh loz-hnoi ong-taaix liepc daaih nyei bungh buonc bieiv zeiv.

31.21: E^le^aa^saa sai mienh yaac mbuox mingh mborqv jaax nzuonx daaih nyei baeng, “Naaiv se ziux Ziouv  jiu bun Mose nyei leiz.
31.15: Mose naaic ninh mbuo, “Meih mbuo weic haaix diuc liouh jienv naaiv deix m'sieqv dorn nyei maengc?
31.23: da'faanh haih zuqc duqv douz nyei yietc zungv oix zuqc jiex douz, ziouc cing-nzengc aqv. Mv baac corc oix zuqc longc saax uix nyei wuom saax. Zuqc maiv duqv douz nyei, oix zuqc jiex wuom.
31.47: Ziux Ziouv  nyei waac, yiem I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei buonc, liemh mienh, liemh saeng-kuv, hmz ziepc dauh maeqv cuotv dauh jiu bun Lewi Mienh, dongh goux zaangc Ziouv nyei ndopv-liuh nyei mienh.
31.20: Yaac oix zuqc saax deix-deix lui-houx caux yietc zungv longc ndopv, yungh biei fai ndiangx zoux daaih nyei ga'naaiv.”
31.18: Mv baac maiv bueix jiex m'jangc dorn wuov deix sieqv se liouh jienv weic meih mbuo ganh.
31.33: ngongh, siec waanc i cin dauh,
31.43: Zuangx baeqc fingx duqv nyei buonc, ba'gi yungh maaih buo sinx buo waanc siec cin hmz baeqv dauh,
31.48: Gunv baeng-guanh nyei zuangx baeng-bieiv, dongh gunv yietc cin dauh nyei bieiv caux yietc baeqv dauh nyei bieiv, mingh taux Mose wuov
31.22: Jiem, nyaanh, dongh siqv, hlieqv, yangh tiec, caux jungz,
31.42: Mose zorqv mingh mborqv jaax caangv daaih nyei ga'naaiv maeqv daaih bun yietc buonc I^saa^laa^en Mienh.
31.50: Yie mbuo gorqv-mienh ziouc dorh yie mbuo duqv daaih nyei jiem-siou-setv, se kou buoz nyei kou, jiemh, maaih yienx nyei buoz-ndoqv-nzaeng, m'normh hiun, caux limc, fongc horc bun Ziouv  weic yiem Ziouv nyei nza'hmien fiqv yie mbuo nyei zuiz.”
31.31: Mose caux E^le^aa^saa sai mienh ziouc ei jienv Ziouv mbuox Mose nyei waac zoux.
31.4: Fingx-fingx I^saa^laa^en Mienh, yietc fingx oix zuqc paaiv yietc cin dauh.”
31.29: Yiem baeng nyei buonc maeqv cuotv naaiv deix, oix zuqc jiu bun E^le^aa^saa sai mienh benx Ziouv  nyei buonc.
31.9: I^saa^laa^en Mienh zorqv Mi^ndien m'sieqv dorn caux fu'jueiv yaac guaatv nzengc Mi^ndien Mienh nyei saeng-kuv, ngongh guanh yungh guanh, yaac luv nzengc ninh mbuo nyei yietc zungv ga'naaiv.
31.37: Fungx bun benx Ziouv  nyei buonc maaih luoqc baeqv cietv ziepc hmz dauh.
31.5: Hnangv naaic, mouz fingx I^saa^laa^en Mienh ginv cuotv yietc cin dauh. Yietc zungv maaih yietc waanc i cin dauh dorh jienv mborqv jaax nyei wuoqc ginc.
31.3: Mose ziouc gorngv mbuox baeqc fingx, “Oix zuqc ginv deix meih mbuo nyei mienh, yaac liuc leiz wuoqc ginc bun ninh mbuo dorh mingh caux Mi^ndien Mienh mborqv jaax weic tengx Ziouv  jaauv win.
31.39: Lorh, duqv buo waanc hmz baeqv dauh. Fungx bun benx Ziouv nyei buonc maaih luoqc ziepc yietv dauh.
31.6: Mose ziouc paaiv ninh mbuo cuotv mingh mborqv jaax, yietc fingx yietc cin dauh. Aengx maaih E^le^aa^saa sai mienh nyei dorn, Fi^ne^hatc, dorh jienv singx dinc nyei jaa-sic yaac nanv jienv nzatc biomv weic zoux jangx-hoc.
31.8: Yiem ninh mbuo daix nyei naaiv deix mienh, maaih Mi^ndien Mienh nyei biaa dauh hungh, Ewi, Lekem, Sux^aa, Hu^aa caux Le^mbaa. Ninh mbuo yaac longc nzuqc ndaauv daix Mbe^o nyei dorn, Mbaa^laa^am.
31.46: mienh, yietc waanc juqv cin dauh.
31.7: Ninh mbuo ziux Ziouv  mbuox Mose nyei waac mborqv Mi^ndien Mienh, yaac daix nzengc ninh mbuo nyei dauh dauh m'jangc dorn.
31.32: Cih cuotv baeng ganh longc nyei, caangv daaih zengc njiec nyei ba'gi yungh maaih juqv sinx siec waanc biaa cin dauh,
31.17: Weic naaiv oix zuqc daix nzengc naaiv deix yietc zungv dorn caux bueix jiex m'jangc dorn nyei m'sieqv dorn.
31.12: dorh taux Mose caux E^le^aa^saa sai mienh caux I^saa^laa^en zuangx mienh nyei ndopv-liuh ciangv wuov, yiem Mo^apc ndau-baengh, Jor^ndaen Ndaaih hlen, Ye^li^ko Zingh doix-ngaanc.
31.34: lorh, juqv waanc yietc cin dauh,
31.30: Yiem I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei buonc, liemh mienh, ngongh, lorh, ba'gi yungh, yungh caux nyungc-nyungc saeng-kuv, hmz ziepc dauh oix zuqc maeqv cuotv yietc dauh bun Lewi Mienh, dongh goux Ziouv nyei Ndopv-Liuh nyei mienh.”
31.11: Ninh mbuo zorqv nzengc ninh mbuo caangv daaih luv daaih nyei ga'naaiv, liemh mienh, liemh saeng-kuv,
31.28: Mingh mborqv jaax nyei baeng duqv nyei buonc, maiv gunv mienh, ngongh, lorh, ba'gi yungh fai yungh, hmz baeqv dauh oix zuqc maeqv cuotv dauh weic fungx bun Ziouv.
31.44: ngongh, buo waanc juqv cin dauh,
31.45: lorh, buo waanc hmz baeqv dauh,
31.19: “Da'faanh daix mienh fai muoqv zuqc janx-daic wuov deix, oix zuqc yiem ga'nyiec ziqc ndopv-liuh ciangv buangv siec hnoi. Da'faam hnoi caux da'cietv hnoi oix zuqc saax nzengc ganh nyei uix caux caangv daaih wuov deix mienh nyei uix.
31.54: Mose caux E^le^aa^saa sai mienh ziouc zipv gunv yietc cin dauh baeng caux yietc baeqv dauh baeng nyei bieiv jiu bun nyei jiem, dorh bieqc Wuic Buangh nyei Ndopv-Liuh an jienv Ziouv  nyei nza'hmien weic bun Ziouv jangx I^saa^laa^en Mienh.
31.35: maiv bueix jiex m'jangc dorn nyei sieqv, buo waanc i cin dauh.
31.41: Mose zorqv maeqv daaih fungx bun Ziouv nyei buonc jiu bun E^le^aa^saa sai mienh ziux Ziouv mbuox Mose nyei waac.
31.13: Mose caux E^le^aa^saa sai mienh caux zuangx mienh nyei bieiv zeiv cuotv ndopv-liuh ciangv mingh buangh ninh mbuo.
31.40: Mienh, duqv yietc waanc juqv cin dauh. Fungx bun benx Ziouv nyei buonc maaih faah ziepc nyeic dauh.
31.26: “Meih caux E^le^aa^saa sai mienh caux baeqc fingx nyei zuangx bieiv zeiv oix zuqc saauv nzengc caangv daaih nyei ga'naaiv, liemh mienh liemh saeng-kuv.
31.52: Gunv yietc cin dauh baeng caux yietc baeqv dauh baeng nyei baeng-bieiv jiu bun Mose caux E^le^aa^saa weih fongc horc bun Ziouv, nyei yietc zungv jiem, nziang daaih maaih yietc baeqv ziepc juov joih.
31.14: Mose qiex jiez haic naaiv deix mborqv jaax nzuonx daaih nyei baeng-bieiv, dongh gunv yietc cin dauh baeng caux yietc baeqv dauh baeng nyei baeng-bieiv.
31.27: Oix zuqc bun nqoi zoux i gouv. Bun yietc gouv mingh mborqv jaax nyei baeng. Bun yietc gouv zuangx mienh.
31.38: Ngongh, duqv buo waanc juqv cin dauh. Fungx bun benx Ziouv nyei buonc maaih cietv ziepc nyeic dauh.
31.49: gorngv mbuox ninh, “Yie mbuo, meih nyei bou, saauv nzengc yiem yie mbuo nyei buoz-ndiev nyei baeng, yaac maiv zitc yietc dauh.
31.36: Mingh mborqv jaax nyei baeng duqv nyei buonc se hnangv naaiv. Ba'gi yungh, duqv buo sinx buo waanc siec cin hmz baeqv dauh.
31.53: (Naaiv deix mborqv jaax nyei baeng, gorqv-mienh caangv daaih nyei ga'naaiv gorqv-mienh ganh longc.)
31.10: I^saa^laa^en Mienh yaac buov nzengc Mi^ndien Mienh nyei zingh caux yietc zungv ndopv-liuh ciangv.
31.2: “Oix zuqc weic I^saa^laa^en Mienh jaauv win bun Mi^ndien Mienh, nqa'haav meih ziouc guei seix aqv.”
31.24: Taux da'cietv hnoi wuov hnoi oix zuqc nzox nzengc lui-houx, meih mbuo ziouc cing-nzengc mi'aqv. Bieqc ndopv-liuh ciangv duqv aqv.”
31.16: Se dongh naaiv deix m'sieqv dorn muangx Mbaa^laa^am nyei waac, yiem Be^o wuov zanc dorh I^saa^laa^en Mienh leih Tin-Hungh ziouc maaih domh wuon-baengc hoic Ziouv  nyei mienh.
31.51: Mose caux E^le^aa^saa sai mienh ziouc zipv ninh mbuo jiu bun nyei jiem, se daav daaih nyei siou-setv.

6.21: “+‘Naaiv se Naasi Mienh nyei leiz, dongh ninh zorqv ganh fungx bun Ziouv  wuov zanc laengz jiez ngaengc waac oix fongc horc haaix nyungc bun Ziouv.  Se gorngv haih laengz bun gauh camv naaic, ninh oix zuqc ei ninh laengz nyei waac zoux nzengc.’+”
6.15: Yaac maaih ziec nyei laangh ziqc caux ciev ziec nyei ga'naaiv yietc njiec ziec. Aengx maaih yietc ndaan maiv an bingv nyei njuov, mbuonv-muonc zorpc jienv ga'lanv youh nyei njuov, caux maiv an bingv nyei njuov-bieqc nzaatv jienv ga'lanv youh.
6.12: Oix zuqc weic dingc daaih nyei hnoi-nyieqc aengx zorqv ganh fungx bun Ziouv.  Yaac oix zuqc dorh dauh yietc hnyangx nyei ba'gi yungh gouv daaih ziec weic ninh zoux dorngc nyei sic. Zinh ndaangc nyei hnoi-nyieqc maiv funx aqv, weic zuqc fungx ganh bun Ziouv  nyei ziangh hoc zuqc maaih uix mi'aqv.
6.17: Ninh aengx zorqv wuov dauh ba'gi yungh gouv caux wuov ndaan maiv an bingv nyei njuov fongc horc ziec bun Ziouv weic jiu tong, yaac maaih ziec nyei laangh ziqc caux ciev ziec nyei ga'naaiv yietc njiec ziec.
6.20: Naaiv deix ga'naaiv sai mienh ziouc zorqv daaih yiem Ziouv  nyei nza'hmien cunv ging weic zoux fongc horc nyei ga'naaiv. Naaiv deix ga'naaiv se cing-nzengc nyei, yaac benx sai mienh nyei mi'aqv, liemh cunv ging fongc horc liuz nyei lorqc hiuang orv caux fongc horc liuz nyei zuih. Yiem naaic mingh, Naasi Mienh hopv duqv a'ngunc diuv aqv.
6.4: Yiem zoux jienv Naasi Mienh nyei ziangh hoc, maiv dungx nyanc yiem a'ngunc hmei cuotv daaih nyei haaix nyungc ga'naaiv. Maiv gunv a'ngunc nyim fai a'ngunc biouv nyei ndopv, maiv dungx nyanc.
6.19: “+‘Naasi Mienh teix liuz fungx bun Ziouv  nyei mba'biei, sai mienh ziouc zorqv norm wuonh zuoqc nyei ba'gi yungh gouv nyei buoz-zuih, aengx zorqv norm yiem ndaan gu'nyuoz maiv an bingv nyei njuov, caux norm maiv an bingv nyei njuov-bieqc, an jienv naaiv dauh Naasi Mienh nyei buoz gu'nyuoz.
6.18: “+‘Naasi Mienh oix zuqc yiem Wuic Buangh Ndopv-Liuh nyei gaengh ndaangc teix nzengc dongh zoux jangx-hoc bun cing ninh zorqv ganh fungx bun Ziouv nyei mba'biei caux siaam. Oix zuqc zorqv wuov deix mba'biei daaih dapv ziec weic jiu tong wuov deix ga'naaiv ga'ndiev maengx nyei douz.
6.23: “Oix zuqc gorngv mbuox Aalon caux ninh nyei dorn, ‘Meih mbuo oix zuqc hnangv naaiv nor buang waac I^saa^laa^en Mienh. Oix zuqc gorngv,
6.13: “+‘Naasi Mienh nyei leiz, dongh ninh zorqv ganh fungx bun Ziouv nyei hnoi-nyieqc buangv, se hnangv naaiv. Oix zuqc dorh ninh mingh taux Wuic Buangh Ndopv-Liuh nyei gaengh ndaangc.
6.9: “+‘Se gorngv yiem ninh nyei ga'hlen maaih mienh liemh zeih daic, ninh fungx bun Ziouv  nyei m'nqorngv ziouc maaih uix. Taux saax uix nyei hnoi, se da'cietv hnoi wuov hnoi, oix zuqc teix nzengc m'nqorngv.
6.26: Tov Ziouv  huin hmien mangc meih, bun meih maaih baengh orn.”+’
6.5: “+‘Yiem laengz jienv zoux Naasi Mienh nyei ziangh hoc maiv dungx teix m'nqorngv. Oix zuqc zuov taux dingc daaih nyei hnoi-nyieqc buangv. Ninh oix zuqc cing-nzengc, zuov taux fungx ganh bun Ziouv  nyei hnoi-nyieqc buangv. Oix zuqc liouh mba'biei caux siaam ndaauv.
6.27: “Hnangv naaic, se gorngv ninh mbuo dengv yie nyei mbuox buang waac I^saa^laa^en Mienh, yie ziouc ceix fuqv bun ninh mbuo.”
6.14: Yiem naaic ninh oix zuqc zorqv ga'naaiv weic fongc horc bun Ziouv.  Longc dauh doix hnyangx, maiv waaic fangx nyei ba'gi yungh gouv weic buov ziec, caux dauh doix hnyangx, maiv waaic fangx nyei ba'gi yungh zeic ziec weic fiqv zuiz, caux dauh maiv waaic fangx nyei ba'gi yungh gouv ziec weic jiu tong.
6.3: wuov dauh oix zuqc gec, maiv dungx hopv a'ngunc diuv fai haaix nyungc diuv. Yaac maiv dungx hopv longc a'ngunc diuv fai haaix nyungc diuv zoux daaih nyei wuom-sui. Maiv dungx hopv a'ngunc biouv nyei wuom fai nyanc a'ngunc biouv, maiv gunv biouv-nyiemz fai biouv-nqaai.
6.7: Liemh ganh nyei die fai maa, gorx fai youz, dorc fai muoc daic, maiv dungx laaix ninh mbuo bun ganh maaih uix, weic zuqc zorqv ganh fungx bun Tin-Hungh nyei jangx-hoc se yiem ninh nyei m'nqorngv.
6.10: Taux da'betv hnoi wuov hnoi, ninh oix zuqc dorh i norm norqc nqo fai i norm baeqc gopv lunx taux Wuic Buangh Ndopv-Liuh nyei gaengh ndaangc jiu bun sai mienh.
6.2: “Oix zuqc mbuox I^saa^laa^en Mienh, ‘Maiv gunv m'jangc m'sieqv, haaix dauh oix lengc jeiv nyei laengz jiez ngaengc waac, zorqv ganh fungx bun Ziouv weic zoux Naasi Mienh,
6.6: Yiem ninh fungx ganh bun Ziouv  nyei ziangh hoc maiv kuh mingh fatv janx-daic nyei sei.
6.8: Da'faanh yiem fungx ganh bun Ziouv  nyei hnoi-nyieqc, ninh benx Ziouv nyei cing-nzengc mienh.
6.24: “+‘+“Tov Ziouv ceix fuqv bun meih, ziux goux meih.
6.25: Tov Ziouv  zoux longx bun meih, ceix en bun meih.
6.11: Sai mienh ziouc zorqv norm ziec weic fiqv zuiz, aengx zorqv norm buov ziec weic wuov laanh mienh nitv zuqc janx-daic ziouc maaih nyei uix. Dongh wuov hnoi ninh yaac oix zuqc saax m'nqorngv nyei uix.
6.16: “+‘Sai mienh ziouc zorqv naaiv deix ga'naaiv daaih yiem Ziouv nyei nza'hmien ziec fiqv zuiz caux buov ziec.

8.21: Lewi Mienh ziouc saax ganh cing-nzengc, aengx nzox nzengc lui-houx. Aalon ziouc fungx bun Ziouv hnangv benx cunv ging fongc horc nyei ga'naaiv. Aalon yaac tengx ninh mbuo fiqv zuiz, saax uix.
8.15: “Meih tengx Lewi Mienh saax uix aengx zorqv ninh mbuo cunv ging fongc horc liuz, ninh mbuo oix zuqc daaih yiem Wuic Buangh nyei Ndopv-Liuh zoux ninh mbuo nyei gong aqv.
8.12: “Lewi Mienh dorh buoz maan jienv naaiv deix i dauh ngongh gouv dorn nyei m'nqorngv liuz, oix zuqc longc dauh ziec bun Ziouv weic fiqv zuiz. Aengx longc dauh buov ziec weic saax Lewi Mienh nyei uix.
8.17: I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei zuangx dorn-la'gauv, liemh yietc zungv saeng-kuv nyei daauh dauh dorn, yie ginv daaih benx yie nyei mi'aqv. Yiem I^yipv Deic-Bung yie daix yietc zungv dorn-la'gauv wuov hnoi, yie ginv cuotv benx yie nyei mi'aqv.
8.20: Mose, Aalon caux I^saa^laa^en nyei zuangx mienh ziouc ziux Ziouv paaiv Mose nyei waac dorh Lewi Mienh ei jienv zoux nzengc.
8.4: Naaiv norm dang hnangv naaiv nor zoux daaih. Ziangh norm dang longc jiem daav daaih yiem ga'ndiev dang-torqv taux gu'nguaaic nyei biangh. Ziux Ziouv mbuox Mose nyei nyungc zeiv zoux ziangx nzengc.
8.19: Yie yaac zorqv Lewi Mienh yiem I^saa^laa^en Mienh mbu'ndongx cuotv daaih fungx bun Aalon caux ninh nyei dorn mbuo dorngx I^saa^laa^en Mienh yiem Wuic Buangh nyei Ndopv-Liuh zoux gong. Ninh mbuo yaac tengx I^saa^laa^en Mienh saax uix weic bun I^saa^laa^en Mienh mingh nitv fatv singx dinc wuov zanc maiv zuqc domh zeqc naanc hoic.”
8.18: Yie yaac ginv Lewi Mienh div I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei zuangx dorn-la'gauv.
8.22: Nqa'haav Lewi Mienh yiem Wuic Buangh nyei Ndopv-Liuh zoux ninh mbuo nyei gong yiem Aalon caux ninh nyei dorn nyei buoz-ndiev. Ziux Ziouv paaiv Mose, ninh mbuo dorh Lewi Mienh ei jienv zoux nzengc.
8.13: Oix zuqc bun Lewi Mienh souv jienv Aalon caux ninh nyei dorn nyei nza'hmien, ziouc zorqv ninh mbuo fungx bun Ziouv, hnangv zoux cunv ging fongc horc nyei ga'naaiv nor.
8.9: Oix zuqc dorh Lewi Mienh daaih yiem Wuic Buangh Ndopv-Liuh nyei nza'hmien maengx, aengx heuc I^saa^laa^en nyei yietc zungv mienh daaih zunv.
8.26: Ninh mbuo haih tengx ninh mbuo nyei gorx-youz yiem Wuic Buangh nyei Ndopv-Liuh zoux gong mv baac maiv zeiz ninh mbuo ganh zoux nzengc. Meih oix zuqc hnangv naaiv nor paaiv Lewi Mienh zoux gong.”
8.14: Hnangv naaiv nor zoux liuz, meih bun Lewi Mienh yiem I^saa^laa^en Mienh mbu'ndongx cuotv daaih ziouc benx yie nyei mi'aqv.
8.3: Aalon ziouc hnangv naaiv nor zoux. Ninh zorqv dang-zaanv an jienv dang-jaax bun ziux nza'hmien maengx, hnangv Ziouv  paaiv Mose nor.
8.7: Oix zuqc hnangv naaiv nor tengx saax uix. Oix zuqc longc saax uix nyei wuom fuqv ninh mbuo, aengx bun ninh mbuo teix nzengc ziangh sin, nzox nzengc ninh mbuo nyei lui-houx, ziouc bun ninh mbuo ganh cing-nzengc.
8.10: Dorh Lewi Mienh daaih yiem Ziouv  nyei nza'hmien wuov zanc, I^saa^laa^en Mienh oix zuqc longc buoz maan jienv ninh mbuo.
8.2: “Oix zuqc mbuox Aalon, ‘Zorqv wuov deix siec norm dang-zaanv an jienv dang-jaax nyei ziangh hoc, oix zuqc bun dang ziux njang dang-jaax nyei nza'hmien maengx.’+”
8.6: “Oix zuqc bun nqoi Lewi Mienh yiem I^saa^laa^en Mienh cuotv daaih yaac tengx ninh mbuo saax uix.
8.8: Oix zuqc bun ninh mbuo dorh dauh ngongh gouv dorn caux ziec nyei laangh ziqc yietc njiec ziec, se longc mbuonv-muonc zorpc jienv youh. Meih oix zuqc aengx ganh longc dauh ngongh gouv dorn ziec fiqv zuiz.
8.24: “Naaiv deix jauv gorngv Lewi Mienh. Yiem nyic ziepc hmz hnyangx faaux maengx nyei m'jangc dorn oix zuqc yiem Wuic Buangh nyei Ndopv-Liuh zoux gong.
8.25: Hnyangx-jeiv buangv hmz ziepc hnyangx wuov deix, oix zuqc dingh ninh mbuo nyei buonc gong, maiv zoux aqv.
8.11: Aalon yaac oix zuqc zorqv Lewi Mienh fungx bun Ziouv weic zoux I^saa^laa^en Mienh cunv ging fongc horc nyei ga'naaiv. Hnangv naaiv zoux liuz, ninh mbuo ziouc haih zoux gong fu-sux Ziouv.
8.16: Naaiv deix mienh yiem I^saa^laa^en Mienh mbu'ndongx cuotv daaih fungx bun yie, benx nzengc yie nyei mienh div dorn-la'gauv, dongh I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei yietc zungv m'sieqv dorn yungz nyei daauh dauh dorn.

24.21: Ninh aengx buatc Kenai Mienh ziouc douc waac gorngv, “Meih yiem nyei dorngx se wuonv haic, meih nyei lauz yiem mbaengx-ngaamh gu'nyuoz.
24.15: Mbaa^laa^am ziouc douc naaiv deix waac, “Naaiv se Mbe^o nyei dorn, Mbaa^laa^am, douc nyei waac. Se m'zing tong nyei mienh douc waac gorngv,
24.12: Mbaa^laa^am dau Mbaalaakv, “Yie m'daaih mbuox jiex meih paaiv daaih nyei mienh,
24.17: “Yie buatc ninh mv baac maiv zeiz ih zanc. Yie mangc ninh mv baac maiv zeiz fatv nyei. Oix maaih norm hleix yiem Yaakopv nyei zeiv-fun cuotv daaih, maaih hungh nyei ndaangh ngau yiem I^saa^laa^en Mienh cuotv. Ninh oix mborqv huv Mo^apc Mienh nyei biorngh, yaac baaic nzengc Setv nyei zeiv-fun.
24.20: Yiem Mbaa^laa^am buatc hinc yaangh nyei sic ninh buatc Aa^maa^lekv Mienh ziouc douc naaiv deix waac, “Yiem maanc guoqv Aa^maa^lekv zoux da'yietv, mv baac setv mueiz ninh zungv zuqc baaic nzengc.”
24.4: dongh haiz Tin-Hungh nyei waac wuov dauh douc nyei waac. Yie nyei m'zing tong, haih mangc duqv buatc Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh hinc yaangh nyei sic.
24.19: Maaih dauh Yaakopv nyei zeiv-fun oix cuotv daaih gunv. Ninh oix mietc nzengc yiem zingh mborqv liuz jaax zengc njiec nyei mienh.”
24.18: E^ndom oix zuqc suei benx ganh dauh nyei. Ninh nyei win-wangv, Se^i, yaac oix zuqc mienh hingh. Mv baac I^saa^laa^en Mienh oix henv jienv faaux.
24.22: Maiv gunv hnangv naaic meih mbuo Kenai Mienh oix zuqc mietc. Atc^su Mienh oix caangv meih mbuo mingh ndongc haaix lauh?”
24.23: Mbaa^laa^am aengx douc waac gorngv, “Kouv aav loh! Tin-Hungh hnangv naaiv zoux, haaix dauh haih maaih maengc ziangh?
24.13: ‘Maiv gunv Mbaalaakv zorqv nzengc buangv hungh dinc nyei jiem nyaanh bun yie, yie yaac maiv haih zoux jiex ndaangc Ziouv mbuox nyei waac, ei yie ganh nyei za'eix zoux longx fai zoux waaic. Ziouv  hnangv haaix nor gorngv, yie yaac oix zuqc hnangv wuov nor gorngv.’
24.9: Ninh mbuo mbaapv njiec bueix jienv hnangv sienh gouv, yaac hnangv sienh nyeiz, haaix dauh gaamv mingh heuc ninh mbuo jiez sin? “Haaix dauh buang waac meih mbuo, tov bun wuov dauh duqv fuqv. Haaix dauh zioux meih mbuo, tov bun wuov dauh zuqc zioux.”
24.5: “O Yaakopv nyei zeiv-fun aac, meih mbuo nyei ndopv-liuh nzueic haic. O I^saa^laa^en Mienh aac, meih mbuo nyei ciangv za'gengh kuh mangc.
24.14: Ih zanc yie nzuonx yie nyei buonv-fingx mienh wuov mv baac daaih maah! Yie mbuox meih nqa'haav hingv naaiv fingx I^saa^laa^en Mienh oix hnangv haaix nor zoux bun meih nyei baeqc fingx.”
24.3: ninh ziouc douc naaiv deix waac, “Naaiv se Mbe^o nyei dorn, Mbaa^laa^am, douc nyei waac. Se m'zing tong nyei mienh douc waac gorngv,
24.7: Wuom oix liouc cuotv ninh mbuo nyei tongv, ninh mbuo nyei zeiv-fun oix yiem maaih wuom camv nyei dorngx. “Ninh mbuo nyei hungh oix gauh hlo jiex Aagakc Hungh, ninh mbuo nyei guoqv yaac oix duqv njang-laangc.
24.10: Mbaalaakv qiex jiez! haic Mbaa^laa^am, ninh ziouc mbaix buoz-zaangv-taatv, doix Mbaa^laa^am gorngv, “Yie heuc meih daaih tengx yie zioux win-wangv. Daaux nzuonx meih buang waac bun ninh mbuo buo nzunc.
24.2: buatc I^saa^laa^en Mienh ziux yietc fingx yietc fingx corng ndopv-liuh yiem ninh mbuo nyei ciangv. Tin-Hungh nyei Singx Lingh njiec daaih yiem jienv ninh,
24.1: Mbaa^laa^am hiuv duqv Ziouv a'hneiv ceix fuqv bun I^saa^laa^en Mienh, ninh ziouc maiv zoux haaix nyungc faatv hnangv da'hnaav nzunc nor. Ninh huin mingh mangc deic-bung-huaang,
24.6: “Meih mbuo hnangv horngz cuotv mingh jangv nyei nor, hnangv yiem ndaaih hlen nyei huingx. Hnangv Ziouv zuangx nyei aa^lo miev-ndaang, hnangv yiem wuom-hlen nyei si^ndaa zongh ndiangx.
24.8: “Tin-Hungh dorh ninh mbuo cuotv I^yipv Deic-Bung, ninh mbuo maaih qaqv hnangv hieh ngongh nor. Ninh mbuo naqv nzengc win-wangv nyei guoqv, wuotv win-wangv nyei mbungv nauv nzengc, longc forng-cang buonv tong ninh mbuo.
24.24: Maaih mienh nzaeng nzangv yiem Kitv^tim Guoqv daaih zoux bun Atc^su caux E^mbe zuqc baaic, mv baac ninh mbuo ganh yaac oix zuqc mietc.”
24.25: Gorngv liuz, Mbaa^laa^am jiez sin nzuonx aqv. Mbaalaakv yaac ziux ninh ganh nyei jauv nzuonx mi'aqv.
24.11: Ih zanc meih biaux nzuonx meih nyei dorngx aqv. Yie gorngv oix bun zingh nyeic hlo nyei, mv baac Ziouv dangv jienv bun meih maiv duqv zipv.”
24.16: dongh haiz Tin-Hungh nyei waac wuov dauh douc nyei waac, se Yiem Hlang Jiex Wuov Dauh bun hiuv nyei jauv. Yie nyei m'zing tong haih mangc duqv buatc nernh jiex nyei Tin-Hungh hinc yaangh nyei sic.

25.15: Zuqc daix wuov dauh Mi^ndien sieqv heuc Kotv^mbi. Ninh nyei die heuc Sux^aa, se yietc bungh Mi^ndien Mienh nyei bieiv zeiv.
25.18: weic zuqc ninh mbuo yiem Be^o nduov meih mbuo, zoux bun meih mbuo benx win-wangv. Laaix yiem Be^o cuotv nyei sic I^saa^laa^en Mienh butv domh wuon-baengc. Yaac doix wuov zanc Mi^ndien Mienh nyei yietc dauh bieiv zeiv nyei sieqv, Kotv^mbi, zuqc daix daic.”
25.12: Oix zuqc mbuox ninh, yie caux ninh liepc jiez baengh orn nyei ngaengc waac,
25.13: se laengz bun ninh caux ninh nyei zeiv-fun yietc liuz duqv zoux sai mienh weic zuqc ninh tengx ninh nyei Tin-Hungh nzaeng I^saa^laa^en Mienh yaac tengx I^saa^laa^en Mienh fiqv zuiz.”
25.5: Mose ziouc mbuox I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei siemv zuiz jien, “Da'faanh meih mbuo nyei haaix dauh mienh zaangc yiem Be^o nyei Mbaa^an zienh, meih mbuo mouz dauh oix zuqc zorqv ninh mbuo daix nzengc.”
25.11: “Aalon sai mienh nyei fun, E^le^aa^saa nyei dorn, Fi^ne^hatc, bun yie maiv qiex jiez I^saa^laa^en Mienh weic zuqc ninh tengx yie nzaeng ninh mbuo, hnangv yie yiem ninh mbuo mbu'ndongx nzaeng ninh mbuo wuov nor. Yie ziouc maiv mietc ninh mbuo.
25.14: Caux Mi^ndien sieqv zuqc daix wuov dauh I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei mbuox heuc Simx^li, se Saax^lu nyei dorn. Saax^lu se Si^me^on Fingx nyei yietc bungh mienh nyei bieiv zeiv.
25.3: Hnangv naaic, I^saa^laa^en Mienh yaac caux jienv ninh mbuo zaangc yiem Be^o nyei Mbaa^an zienh. Ziouv ziouc qiex jiez! haic I^saa^laa^en Mienh.
25.2: Ziec ninh mbuo nyei zienh nyei ziangh hoc, naaiv deix m'sieqv dorn yuoqc I^saa^laa^en Mienh caux jienv mingh. I^saa^laa^en Mienh ziouc nyanc ziec jiex nyei ga'naaiv, yaac gueic njiec baaix wuov deix zienh.
25.1: I^saa^laa^en Mienh yiem Sitv^tim Deic wuov zanc, maaih deix baeqc fingx jiez gorn hienx Mo^apc Mienh nyei sieqv.
25.4: Ziouv  mbuox Mose, “Zorqv naaiv deix mienh nyei zuangx bieiv zeiv lungh hnoi zanc, njang nyei ziangh hoc, yiem nqaengc nyei dorngx dorng jienv Ziouv  nyei nza'hmien daix, weic bun Ziouv  maiv qiex jiez, nouz haic I^saa^laa^en Mienh.”
25.6: I^saa^laa^en nyei zuangx mienh gapv zunv yiem Wuic Buangh Ndopv-Liuh nyei gaengh ndaangc nyiemv wuov zanc, maaih dauh I^saa^laa^en Mienh dorng jienv Mose caux zuangx mienh dorh dauh Mi^ndien sieqv daaih bieqc ninh nyei ndopv-liuh.
25.8: gan jienv wuov dauh I^saa^laa^en Mienh bieqc ndopv-liuh gu'nyuoz wuov qongx. Ninh longc cang nzopv ninh mbuo i dauh, nzopv tong wuov dauh I^saa^laa^en m'jangc dorn bieqc wuov dauh Mi^ndien sieqv nyei sin. Hnangv naaic, yiem I^saa^laa^en Mienh mbu'ndongx nyei domh wuon-baengc ziouc dingh mi'aqv.
25.9: Mv baac laaix butv naaiv nyungc wuon-baengc daic nyei mienh, zungv maaih i waanc biei cin dauh.
25.7: Aalon sai mienh nyei fun, E^le^aa^saa nyei dorn, Fi^ne^hatc, buatc, ninh ziouc yiem zuangx mienh mbu'ndongx cuotv daaih, nanv diuh cang
25.17: “Oix zuqc zoux bun Mi^ndien Mienh benx win-wangv aqv, yaac daix ninh mbuo,

29.21: Ngongh gouv, ba'gi yungh gouv caux ba'gi yungh dorn ziux leiz dingc daaih nyei soux mouc oix zuqc maaih ziec nyei laangh ziqc caux ciev ziec nyei ga'naaiv yietc njiec ziec.
29.15: Wuov deix ziepc feix dauh ba'gi yungh dorn, mouz dauh oix zuqc maaih yietc morqv.
29.37: Ngongh gouv, ba'gi yungh gouv caux ba'gi yungh dorn ziux leiz dingc daaih nyei soux mouc oix zuqc maaih ziec nyei laangh ziqc caux ciev ziec nyei ga'naaiv yietc njiec ziec.
29.12: “+‘Cietv hlaax, ziepc hmz wuov hnoi, oix zuqc gapv zunv zoux leiz-baaix yaac maiv dungx zoux haaix nyungc hnoi-hnoi zoux nyei gong. Oix zuqc jiex zipv houc Ziouv buangv siec hnoi.
29.17: “+‘Zipv nyei da'nyeic hnoi, oix zuqc dorh ziepc nyeic dauh ngongh gouv caan, i dauh ba'gi yungh gouv caux ziepc feix dauh doix hnyangx nyei ba'gi yungh gouv dorn daaih ziec, yietc zungv maiv waaic fangx nyei.
29.30: Ngongh gouv, ba'gi yungh gouv caux ba'gi yungh dorn ziux leiz dingc daaih nyei soux mouc oix zuqc maaih ziec nyei laangh ziqc caux ciev ziec nyei ga'naaiv yietc njiec ziec.
29.20: “+‘Zipv nyei da'faam hnoi, oix zuqc dorh ziepc yietv dauh ngongh gouv caan, i dauh ba'gi yungh gouv caux ziepc feix dauh doix hnyangx nyei ba'gi yungh gouv dorn daaih ziec, yietc zungv maiv waaic fangx nyei.
29.4: mouz dauh ba'gi yungh dorn, yietc dauh i morqv.
29.28: Aengx longc dauh yungh gouv ziec fiqv zuiz. Corc maaih hnoi-hnoi buov ziec nyei caux jienv ziec nyei laangh ziqc caux ciev ziec nyei a'ngunc diuv.
29.33: Ngongh gouv, ba'gi yungh gouv caux ba'gi yungh dorn ziux leiz dingc daaih nyei soux mouc, oix zuqc maaih ziec nyei laangh ziqc caux ciev ziec nyei ga'naaiv yietc njiec ziec.
29.35: “+‘Zipv nyei da'betv hnoi, oix zuqc gapv zunv zoux leiz-baaix yaac maiv dungx zoux haaix nyungc hnoi-hnoi zoux nyei gong.
29.19: Aengx longc dauh yungh gouv ziec fiqv zuiz. Corc maaih hnoi-hnoi buov ziec nyei caux jienv ziec nyei laangh ziqc caux ciev ziec nyei a'ngunc diuv.
29.34: Aengx longc dauh yungh gouv ziec fiqv zuiz. Corc maaih hnoi-hnoi buov ziec nyei caux jienv ziec nyei laangh ziqc caux ciev ziec nyei a'ngunc diuv.
29.18: Ngongh gouv, ba'gi yungh gouv caux ba'gi yungh dorn ziux leiz dingc daaih nyei soux mouc, oix zuqc maaih ziec nyei laangh ziqc caux ciev ziec nyei ga'naaiv yietc njiec ziec.
29.22: Aengx longc dauh yungh gouv ziec fiqv zuiz. Corc maaih hnoi-hnoi buov ziec nyei caux jienv ziec nyei laangh ziqc caux ciev ziec nyei a'ngunc diuv.
29.23: “+‘Zipv nyei da'feix hnoi, oix zuqc dorh ziepc dauh ngongh gouv caan, i dauh ba'gi yungh gouv caux ziepc feix dauh doix hnyangx nyei ba'gi yungh gouv dorn daaih ziec, yietc zungv maiv waaic fangx nyei.
29.13: Yaac oix zuqc dorh ga'naaiv longc douz buov ziec fongc horc, weih ndaang nyei qiex horpc Ziouv  nyei hnyouv. Oix zuqc dorh ziepc faam dauh ngongh gouv caan, i dauh ba'gi yungh gouv, ziepc feix dauh doix hnyangx nyei ba'gi yungh gouv dorn, yietc zungv maiv waaic fangx nyei.
29.9: Ngongh gouv oix zuqc maaih juqv morqv bienx mbuonv-muonc zorpc jienv ga'lanv youh zoux ziec nyei laangh ziqc. Ba'gi yungh gouv oix zuqc maaih biei morqv bienx.
29.40: Mose ziux Ziouv  paaiv ninh nyei yietc zungv waac mbuox nzengc I^saa^laa^en Mienh.
29.26: “+‘Zipv nyei da'hmz hnoi, oix zuqc dorh nduoh dauh ngongh gouv caan, i dauh ba'gi yungh gouv caux ziepc feix dauh doix hnyangx nyei ba'gi yungh gouv dorn daaih ziec, yietc zungv maiv waaic fangx nyei.
29.5: yaac oix zuqc longc dauh yungh gouv ziec weic fiqv meih mbuo nyei zuiz.
29.27: Ngongh gouv, ba'gi yungh gouv caux ba'gi yungh dorn, ziux leiz dingc daaih nyei soux mouc oix zuqc maaih ziec nyei laangh ziqc caux ciev ziec nyei ga'naaiv yietc njiec ziec.
29.38: Aengx longc dauh yungh gouv ziec fiqv zuiz. Corc maaih hnoi-hnoi buov ziec nyei caux jienv yietc njiec ziec nyei laangh ziqc caux ciev ziec nyei a'ngunc diuv.
29.14: Ziepc faam dauh ngongh gouv, mouz dauh oix zuqc maaih juqv morqv bienx mbuonv-muonc zorpc jienv ga'lanv youh zoux ziec nyei laangh ziqc. Yietc dauh yungh gouv oix zuqc maaih biei morqv bienx.
29.3: Ngongh gouv caan oix zuqc maaih juqv morqv bienx mbuonv-muonc zorpc jienv ga'lanv youh zoux ziec nyei laangh ziqc. Ba'gi yungh gouv oix zuqc maaih biei morqv bienx.
29.7: “+‘Cietv hlaax saeng-ziepc wuov hnoi, oix zuqc gapv zunv zoux leiz-baaix, zei maiv nyanc haaix nyungc, yaac maiv dungx zoux haaix nyungc gong.
29.39: “+‘Ziux dingc daaih nyei zipv oix zuqc longc naaiv deix ga'naaiv ziec bun Ziouv. Maaih buov ziec nyei, ziec nyei laangh ziqc, ciev ziec nyei ga'naaiv aengx caux ziec weic jiu tong nyei ga'naaiv. Corc aengx maaih jaauv sung laengz nyei ngaengc waac caux cuotv fim fongc horc nyei ga'naaiv.’+”
29.36: Oix zuqc fongc horc longc douz buov ziec nyei ga'naaiv, weih ndaang nyei qiex horpc Ziouv  nyei hnyouv. Se oix zuqc dorh yietc dauh ngongh gouv, yietc dauh ba'gi yungh gouv caux siec dauh doix hnyangx nyei ba'gi yungh gouv dorn, yietc zungv maiv waaic fangx nyei.
29.10: Siec dauh yungh dorn, yietc dauh yietc morqv.
29.2: Oix zuqc dorh ga'naaiv buov ziec fongc horc, weih ndaang nyei qiex horpc Ziouv nyei hnyouv. Se dorh yietc dauh ngongh gouv caan, yietc dauh ba'gi yungh gouv, siec dauh doix hnyangx nyei ba'gi yungh gouv dorn, yietc zungv maiv waaic fangx nyei.
29.1: “+‘Cietv hlaax, saeng-yietv, oix zuqc gapv zunv zoux leiz-baaix, yaac maiv dungx zoux haaix nyungc hnoi-hnoi zoux nyei gong. Naaiv se meih mbuo biomv nzatc nyei hnoi.
29.31: Aengx longc dauh yungh gouv ziec fiqv zuiz. Corc maaih hnoi-hnoi buov ziec nyei caux jienv ziec nyei laangh ziqc caux ciev ziec nyei a'ngunc diuv.
29.6: Corc oix zuqc aengx maaih mouz hlaax bieqc siang-hlaax fongc horc buov ziec nyei caux jienv yietc njiec ziec nyei laangh ziqc. Yaac maaih ziux leiz-nyeic hnoi-hnoi buov ziec nyei caux jienv yietc njiec fongc horc ziec nyei laangh ziqc caux ciev ziec nyei ga'naaiv. Naaiv se longc douz buov ziec fongc horc nyei ga'naaiv, weih ndaang nyei qiex horpc Ziouv  nyei hnyouv.
29.8: Oix zuqc dorh ga'naaiv mingh buov ziec bun Ziouv weic zoux ndaang nyei qiex. Oix zuqc dorh dauh ngongh gouv caan, yietc dauh ba'gi yungh gouv caux siec dauh doix hnyangx nyei ba'gi yungh gouv dorn, yietc zungv maiv waaic fangx nyei.
29.24: Ngongh gouv, ba'gi yungh gouv caux ba'gi yungh dorn, ziux leiz dingc daaih nyei soux mouc, oix zuqc maaih ziec nyei laangh ziqc caux ciev ziec nyei ga'naaiv yietc njiec ziec.
29.25: Aengx longc dauh yungh gouv ziec fiqv zuiz. Corc maaih hnoi-hnoi buov ziec nyei caux jienv ziec nyei laangh ziqc caux ciev ziec nyei a'ngunc diuv.
29.29: “+‘Zipv nyei da'luoqc hnoi, oix zuqc dorh hietc dauh ngongh gouv caan, i dauh ba'gi yungh gouv caux ziepc feix dauh doix hnyangx nyei ba'gi yungh gouv dorn daaih ziec, yietc zungv maiv waaic fangx nyei.
29.11: Aengx ganh longc dauh yungh gouv ziec fiqv zuiz. Naaiv se tipv dauh ziec fiqv zuiz nyei yungh gouv. Corc aengx maaih hnoi-hnoi buov ziec nyei caux jienv yietc njiec ziec nyei laangh ziqc caux ciev ziec nyei a'ngunc diuv.
29.32: “+‘Zipv nyei da'cietv hnoi, oix zuqc dorh siec dauh ngongh gouv caan, i dauh ba'gi yungh gouv caux ziepc feix dauh doix hnyangx nyei ba'gi yungh gouv dorn daaih ziec, yietc zungv maiv waaic fangx nyei.
29.16: Aengx longc dauh yungh gouv ziec weic fiqv zuiz. Corc maaih hnoi-hnoi buov nyei caux jienv yietc njiec ziec nyei laangh ziqc caux ciev ziec nyei a'ngunc diuv.

11.21: Mose gorngv, “Caux yie yangh jauv nyei m'jangc dorn maaih juqv sinx dauh. Ziouv yaac gorngv yie oix bun orv ninh mbuo nyanc gaux yietc hlaax nyieqc.
11.15: Se gorngv Ziouv  oix hnangv naaiv nor zoux bun yie, yaac se gorngv Ziouv  buangv eix yie, tov bun yie ih zanc zuqc daic, yie ziouc maiv zuqc buatc yie ganh nyei kouv-zingh.”
11.12: Naaiv deix zuangx mienh yie ganh maaih daaih fai? Se yie ganh yungz daaih fai? Ziouv  weic haaix diuc heuc yie hlorpv jienv ninh mbuo hnangv maa hlorpv jienv hopv nyorx nyei gu'nguaaz nor, dorh mingh taux meih laengz jiez ngaengc waac oix bun ninh mbuo nyei ong-taaix wuov norm deic-bung?
11.17: Yie ziouc njiec daaih caux meih yiem naaic gorngv waac. Yie oix zorqv deix yiem meih wuov dauh Singx Lingh bun yiem ninh mbuo. Ninh mbuo ziouc tengx meih ndaam naaiv deix mienh weic bun meih ganh nduqc dauh hnangv maiv zuqc ndaam hniev.
11.30: Mose caux I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei mienh gox ziouc nzuonx ndopv-liuh ciangv mi'aqv.
11.20: Nyanc taux buangv yietc hlaax nyieqc, taux orv zungv yangh meih mbuo nyei mba'zorng-kuotv baetv cuotv, meih mbuo yaac youx nzengc aqv. Weic zuqc meih mbuo nqemh Ziouv, dongh yiem meih mbuo mbu'ndongx wuov dauh, yaac dorng jienv Ziouv nyiemv jienv gorngv, “Yie mbuo weic haaix diuc cuotv I^yipv Deic-Bung?”+’+”
11.4: Maaih deix Janx zorpc jienv I^saa^laa^en Mienh mingh yaac jiez gorn cei oix nyanc ganh nyungc ga'naaiv. Liemh I^saa^laa^en Mienh aengx nyiemv jienv gorngv, “Feix duqv yie mbuo maaih orv nyanc.
11.28: Nun nyei dorn, Yo^su^waa, yiem ninh lunx nyei ziangh hoc zoux Mose nyei borng-buoz mienh. Yo^su^waa gorngv, “Yie nyei ziouv, Mose aah! Dangv jienv ninh mbuo maah!”
11.33: Norqc orv corc yiem ninh mbuo nyei nyaah mbu'ndongx, maiv gaengh duqv nziuc, Ziouv za'gengh! qiex jiez haic zuangx mienh, ziouc bun butv domh wuon-baengc daix ninh mbuo.
11.35: Baeqc fingx yiem Kipc^lotv Hatc^daa^aa^waa cuotv jauv mingh taux Haa^se^lotv ziouc yiem naaic aqv.
11.19: Maiv daan nyanc yietc hnoi hnangv, fai i hnoi, fai biaa hnoi, fai ziepc hnoi, fai nyic ziepc hnoi.
11.34: Wuov norm dorngx ziouc cuotv mbuox heuc Kipc^lotv Hatc^daa^aa^waa, weic zuqc wuov norm dorngx ninh mbuo biopv cei ganh nyungc ga'naaiv wuov deix yietc zungv mienh.
11.18: “Oix zuqc mbuox baeqc fingx, ‘Meih mbuo oix zuqc saax nzengc uix, liuc leiz ziangx weic njang hnoi, meih mbuo ziouc duqv orv nyanc aqv. Weic zuqc meih mbuo nyiemv, Ziouv yaac haiz mi'aqv. Meih mbuo gorngv, “Feix duqv yie mbuo maaih orv nyanc. Yiem I^yipv Deic-Bung yie mbuo zungv duqv gauh longx.” Weic naaiv Ziouv  oix bun orv meih mbuo nyanc, meih mbuo ziouc duqv nyanc aqv.
11.22: Zorqv yungh guanh, ngongh guanh, daix bun ninh mbuo maaih gaux nyei fai? Zorqv nzengc yietc zungv koiv nyei mbiauz maaih gaux ninh mbuo nyanc fai?”
11.23: Ziouv dau Mose, “Ziouv  nyei buoz nangv haic fai? Ih zanc meih oix duqv buatc yie caux meih gorngv nyei waac weic meih cuotv daaih zien fai maiv zien.”
11.13: Yie oix zuqc mingh haaix duqv orv gaux bun naaiv deix zuangx mienh nyanc? Ninh mbuo dorng jienv yie nyiemv jienv gorngv, ‘Bun orv yie mbuo nyanc maah!’
11.9: Lungh muonz zanc mbiungc-suiv njiec ndopv-liuh ciangv nyei ziangh hoc, maa^naa yaac njiec aqv.
11.26: Mv baac maaih i dauh mienh, mbuox heuc En^ndaatc caux Me^ndaatc, corc yiem wuov ndopv-liuh ciangv. Ninh mbuo m'daaih caux wuov deix mienh gox faaux mbuox, mv baac maiv cuotv mingh yiem Wuic Buangh nyei Ndopv-Liuh. Singx Lingh corc daaih zepv jienv ninh mbuo, ninh mbuo yaac yiem wuov ciangv gu'nyuoz douc Ziouv nyei waac.
11.5: Jangx zuqc yiem I^yipv Deic-Bung wuov zanc duqv nyanc nyei mbiauz yaac maiv zuqc ndortv nyaanh. Yaac jangx zuqc guaa-wuom, guaa-domx, Janx-Kaeqv funx, cong caux funx.
11.27: Maaih dauh mienh lunx mienh tiux jienv mingh mbuox Mose, “En^ndaatc caux Me^ndaatc yiem wuov ciangv douc Ziouv  nyei waac aex!”
11.14: Yie ganh nduqc laanh mienh hnangv, ndaam maiv dongz naaiv deix mienh camv. Yie haiz ba'laqc hniev haic.
11.3: Wuov norm dorngx ziouc cuotv mbuox heuc Taa^mbe^laa, weic zuqc yiem wuov Ziouv nyei douz zieqc jienv ninh mbuo mbu'ndongx.
11.7: Maa^naa se hnangv yienh si nyim, setv zeiv hnangv ndiangx-zung.
11.10: Mose haiz buonc-buonc mienh, gorqv-mienh yiem gorqv-mienh nyei ndopv-liuh gaengh ndaangc nyiemv. Ziouv ziouc qiex jiez! haic aqv. Mose yaac maiv a'hneiv ninh mbuo.
11.2: Baeqc fingx qaqv heuc Mose tengx. Mose daux gaux tov Ziouv, douz ziouc daic mi'aqv.
11.1: Zuangx baeqc fingx ngopv ninh mbuo zuqc diev nyei kouv naanc. Ziouv  yaac haiz mi'aqv, ziouc qiex jiez haic, bungx douz njiec daaih yiem ninh mbuo mbu'ndongx zieqc jienv. Ndopv-liuh ciangv ga'hlen maaih deix dorngx zungv buov qui nzengc.
11.31: Ziouv bun nziaaux buonc norqc mbunh yiem koiv wuov bung daaih njiec huing gormx ndopv-liuh ciangv, zungv taux bung-bung cuotv mingh yietc hnoi nyei jauv. Norqc ndaix jienv ndau-beih gu'nguaaic i ndorqc hlang.
11.6: Ih zanc haiz sin zaangc mau nzengc, maiv maaih qaqv aqv. Cuotv liuz naaiv maa^naa, maiv maaih ganh nyungc mangc.”
11.8: Baeqc fingx cuotv mingh jiex naaiv jiex wuov siou daaih morc fai zong, aengx dapv caeng zouv fai zoux benx njuov yietc norm, yietc norm nyei. Mueix se hnangv yietc nyungc ga'naaiv zorpc jienv ga'lanv youh nor.
11.24: Mose ziouc cuotv mingh ziang Ziouv  nyei waac mbuox baeqc fingx. Ninh dorh cietv ziepc dauh ninh mbuo nyei mienh gox daaih gapv zunv bun ninh mbuo souv jienv huing gormx Wuic Buangh nyei Ndopv-Liuh.
11.25: Ziouv ziouc yiem wuov dorv mbuonx njiec daaih caux Mose gorngv waac yaac zorqv deix yiem Mose wuov dauh Singx Lingh, bun Singx Lingh yiem wuov deix cietv ziepc dauh mienh gox. Singx Lingh daaih zepv ninh mbuo nyei sin nyei ziangh hoc, ninh mbuo douc Ziouv nyei waac. Nqa'haav maiv douc aqv.
11.29: Mv baac Mose dau, “Meih weic yie mueic jieqv fai? Feix duqv Ziouv  nyei mienh yietc zungv haih zoux douc waac mienh. Yaac feix duqv Ziouv  bun ninh nyei Singx Lingh yiem ninh mbuo yietc zungv.”
11.11: Mose gorngv mbuox Ziouv, “Ziouv  weic haaix diuc bun yie, meih nyei bou, zuqc ndongc naaiv kouv? Yie zoux haaix nyungc maiv horpc meih nyei hnyouv meih cingx daaih zorqv naaiv deix mienh bun yie ndaam ndongc naaiv hniev?
11.32: Wuov hnoi mienh cuotv mingh ziangh hnoi ziangh muonz zorqv norqc mbunh, aengx zorqv taux da'nyeic hnoi hmuangx. Zoix zoqc yietc dauh mienh duqv yietc baeqv tongv. Siou daaih ninh mbuo yaac pui buangv ndopv-liuh ciangv.
11.16: Ziouv  mbuox Mose, “Oix zuqc heuc cietv ziepc dauh I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei mienh gox, dongh meih hiuv duqv yiem baeqc fingx mbu'ndongx zoux mienh gox yaac zoux jien wuov deix. Dorh ninh mbuo daaih taux Wuic Buangh nyei Ndopv-Liuh bun ninh mbuo caux meih souv jienv naaic.

32.21: meih mbuo yietc zungv dorh wuoqc ginc nyei mienh yaac yiem Ziouv nyei nza'hmien jiex Jor^ndaen Ndaaih zuov Ziouv zunc ninh nyei win-wangv tuix cuotv,
32.15: Se gorngv meih mbuo huin nqaang, maiv gan ninh, ninh oix bun naaiv deix zuangx mienh aengx zuqc yiem deic-bung-huaang, yaac laaix meih mbuo bun ninh mbuo zuqc mietc nzengc.”
32.37: Lu^mben Fingx aengx ganh ceix jiez Hetv^mbon Zingh, E^le^aa^le caux Ki^li^yaa^taa^im,
32.12: Kungx maaih Kenatv Mienh, Ye^fun^ne nyei dorn, Kaalepv, caux Nun nyei dorn, Yo^su^waa, duqv buatc, weic zuqc ninh mbuo i dauh longc nzengc hnyouv gan yie.’
32.17: Yie mbuo ganh aeqv, oix dorh mborqv jaax nyei wuoqc ginc mingh ndaangc I^saa^laa^en Mienh, zuov ninh mbuo yietc zungv taux ninh mbuo nyei dorngx. Mv baac yie mbuo nyei auv-jueiv oix zuqc yiem naaiv weih wuonv nyei zingh weic mbungh naaiv norm deic-bung nyei mienh.
32.30: Mv baac se gorngv ninh mbuo maiv dorh wuoqc ginc caux jienv meih mbuo jiex wuov ngaanc, ninh mbuo duqv nzipc nyei buonc oix zuqc caux meih mbuo yiem Kaa^naa^an Deic.”
32.20: Mose ziouc gorngv mbuox ninh mbuo, “Se gorngv meih mbuo za'gengh ei meih mbuo nyei waac zoux, yiem Ziouv nyei nza'hmien dorh jienv wuoqc ginc cuotv mingh mborqv jaax,
32.4: “Ziouv  tengx I^saa^laa^en Mienh caangv daaih nyei deic-bung maaih Aa^taa^lotv Zingh, Ndi^mbon, Yaase, Nimlaa, Hetv^mbon, E^le^aa^le, Se^mbaam, Ne^mbo, caux Mbe^on Zingh. Se kuh yungz saeng-kuv haic. Yie mbuo, meih nyei bou, yaac maaih ngongh maaih ba'gi yungh camv haic.”
32.28: Mose weic naaiv deix mienh paaiv waac mbuox E^le^aa^saa sai mienh caux Nun nyei dorn, Yo^su^waa, caux fingx-fingx I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei bieiv zeiv.
32.33: Mose ziouc jiu naaiv deix deic-bung bun Gaatc Fingx caux Lu^mben Fingx aengx caux Yosepv nyei dorn, Maa^natv^se, nyei ndaamv-fingx. Ninh zorqv Aa^mo^lai Mienh nyei Si^honx Hungh nyei guoqv, caux Mbaasaan nyei hungh, Okc, nyei guoqv, liemh wuov norm deic-bung nyei norm-norm zingh caux weih gormx nyei deic jiu bun ninh mbuo.
32.42: No^mbaa caangv Kenaatv caux weih gormx nyei laangz, aengx tengx wuov norm dorngx cuotv mbuox nitv ninh ganh nyei mbuox, No^mbaa.
32.19: Yie mbuo maiv caux ninh mbuo yiem wuov bung Jor^ndaen Ndaaih nzipc haaix nyungc weic zuqc yie mbuo duqv nzipc nyei buonc se yiem naaiv bung Jor^ndaen Ndaaih dong bung maengx.”
32.34: Gaatc Fingx aengx ceix Ndi^mbon Zingh, Aa^taa^lotv, Aa^lo^e,
32.18: Yie mbuo maiv nzuonx biauv, zuov taux mouz dauh I^saa^laa^en Mienh duqv zipv ninh mbuo nzipc nyei buonc.
32.22: wuov norm deic-bung yaac guei nzengc Ziouv, nqa'haav meih mbuo haih nzuonx daaih. Laengz bun Ziouv  caux I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei waac yaac sung mi'aqv. Naaiv norm deic-bung yiem Ziouv  nyei nza'hmien benx meih mbuo nzipc nyei buonc.
32.23: “Mv baac se gorngv meih mbuo maiv ei jienv meih mbuo laengz nyei waac zoux, meih mbuo ziouc baamz zuiz dorngc Ziouv,  yaac weic ganh zoux nyei ndongc haaix zungv zuqc dingc zuiz.
32.13: Ziouv  ziouc qiex jiez haic I^saa^laa^en Mienh, bun ninh mbuo youh mingh youh daaih yiem wuov deic-bung-huaang feix ziepc hnyangx, zuov yiem ninh nyei nza'hmien zoux waaic wuov doic mienh yietc zungv daic nzengc.
32.9: Mingh taux Etc^ko Horngz, zaah liuz wuov norm deic-bung nzuonx daaih wuov zanc, ninh mbuo zoux bun zuangx baeqc fingx hnyouv mau, maiv bieqc Ziouv  ceix bun nyei deic-bung.
32.40: Mose ziouc zorqv Gi^le^aatc Deic bun Maa^natv^se nyei zeiv-fun, Maa^ki^le Mienh. Ninh mbuo ziouc yiem wuov norm deic-bung aqv.
32.26: Yie mbuo nyei auv-jueiv, ngongh, yungh caux ba'gi yungh, oix zuqc yiem naaiv Gi^le^aatc Deic nyei norm-norm zingh.
32.41: Maa^natv^se nyei zeiv-fun, Jaa^i, aengx caangv Gi^le^aatc nyei fiuv-laangz yaac weic naaiv deix fiuv-laangz cuotv mbuox heuc Haau^wotv Jaa^i.
32.5: Ninh mbuo aengx gorngv, “Se gorngv yie mbuo horpc meih nyei hnyouv, tov bun naaiv norm deic-bung benx yie mbuo nyei buonc. Tov maiv dungx dorh yie mbuo jiex wuov ngaanc ziqc Jor^ndaen Ndaaih yiem.”
32.27: Mv baac yie mbuo, meih nyei bou, dauh dauh m'jangc dorn, oix dorh jienv mborqv jaax nyei wuoqc ginc yiem Ziouv  nyei nza'hmien jiex ndaaih mborqv jaax, hnangv meih, yie mbuo nyei ziouv, gorngv nor.”
32.38: yaac ganh ceix jiez Ne^mbo caux Mbaa^an Me^on, (naaiv deix mbuox nqa'haav tiuv mi'aqv), caux Sipc^maa. Ninh mbuo aengx weic ninh mbuo liepc daaih nyei zingh cuotv mbuox.
32.14: “Ih zanc mangc gaax! Meih mbuo nzipc jienv meih mbuo nyei die benx ganh baan zuiz-mienh, oix zoux bun Ziouv  gauh fatv qiex jiez I^saa^laa^en Mienh.
32.7: Meih mbuo weic haaix diuc oix bun I^saa^laa^en Mienh hnyouv mau ziouc maiv jiex wuov ngaanc bieqc Ziouv  ceix bun meih mbuo wuov norm deic-bung?
32.39: Maa^natv^se nyei dorn, Maa^ki^le, nyei fun-faqv mingh caangv Gi^le^aatc Deic-Bung, aengx zunc cuotv yiem wuov nyei Aa^mo^lai Mienh.
32.36: Mbetc Nimlaa caux Mbetc Haalaan, zoux zingh laatc wuonv nyei weih gormx zingh. Ninh mbuo aengx zoux yungh caux ba'gi yungh nyei laanh.
32.10: Dongh wuov hnoi Ziouv  qiex jiez haic ziouc houv jienv gorngv,
32.2: ziouc mingh mbuox Mose caux E^le^aa^saa sai mienh caux baeqc fingx nyei bieiv zeiv,
32.1: Lu^mben Fingx caux Gaatc Fingx maaih ngongh, maaih ba'gi yungh camv haic. Ninh mbuo buatc Yaase caux Gi^le^aatc Deic kuh yungz saeng-kuv haic,
32.31: Gaatc caux Lu^mben Mienh dau, “Ziouv Tin-Hungh hnangv haaix nor mbuox yie mbuo, meih nyei bou, yie mbuo ziouc hnangv wuov nor zoux.
32.6: Mose dau Gaatc Fingx caux Lu^mben Fingx, “Oix bun meih mbuo nyei gorx-youz cuotv mingh mborqv jaax mv baac meih mbuo ganh kungx zueiz jienv naaiv?
32.8: Zinh ndaangc yiem Kaa^ndetc Mbaanie wuov zanc, yie paaiv meih mbuo nyei die mingh zaah wuov norm deic-bung nyei ziangh hoc, ninh mbuo hnangv naaiv nor zoux.
32.24: Gunv ceix zingh weic meih mbuo nyei auv-jueiv yaac zoux laatc wuonx jienv meih mbuo nyei yungh caux ba'gi yungh. Mv baac oix zuqc ei jienv meih mbuo laengz liuz nyei waac zoux.”
32.25: Gaatc Fingx caux Lu^mben Fingx nyei mienh gorngv mbuox Mose, “Yie mbuo, meih nyei bou, oix ei jienv meih, yie mbuo nyei ziouv, mbuox nyei waac zoux.
32.29: Ninh gorngv, “Se gorngv Gaatc Fingx caux Lu^mben Fingx, yietc zungv m'jangc dorn, dorh jienv mborqv jaax nyei wuoqc ginc, caux jienv meih mbuo yiem Ziouv  nyei nza'hmien jiex wuov ngaanc ziqc Jor^ndaen Ndaaih, wuov norm deic-bung yaac guei nzengc meih mbuo, meih mbuo oix zuqc zorqv Gi^le^aatc Deic zoux ninh mbuo nzipc nyei buonc.
32.11: ‘Da'faanh yiem I^yipv Deic-Bung cuotv nyei mienh, hnyangx-jeiv nyic ziepc hnyangx faaux maengx nyei m'jangc dorn, laaix ninh mbuo maiv longc nzengc hnyouv gan yie, hnangv haaix zungv maiv maaih yietc dauh duqv buatc yie laengz ngaengc waac bun Apc^laa^ham, I^sakc caux Yaakopv wuov norm deic-bung.
32.32: Yie mbuo oix dorh wuoqc ginc yiem Ziouv nyei nza'hmien bieqc Kaa^naa^an Deic-Bung, mv baac yie mbuo duqv nzipc nyei buonc se yiem naaiv bung Jor^ndaen Ndaaih.”
32.16: Ninh mbuo ziouc mingh fatv deix Mose yaac gorngv, “Yie mbuo oix yiem naaiv zoux laatc weih yungh caux ba'gi yungh, yaac ceix zingh laatc weic beu jienv yie mbuo nyei auv-jueiv.

16.21: “Meih mbuo oix zuqc simv nqoi naaiv deix zuangx mienh. Ndongc nziepv dangh m'zing yie ziouc mietc nzengc ninh mbuo.”
16.15: Mose qiex jiez! haic ziouc gorngv mbuox Ziouv,  “Tov maiv dungx zipv ninh mbuo fongc horc nyei ga'naaiv. Yie zungv maiv zorqv jiex ninh mbuo nyei yietc dauh lorh. Yaac maiv hoic jiex ninh mbuo nyei haaix dauh mienh.”
16.47: Aalon ziouc ei Mose nyei waac zoux, tiux bieqc zuangx mienh mbu'ndongx. Mienh jiez gorn zuqc domh wuon-baengc, mv baac Aalon zorqv hung tengx baeqc fingx fiqv zuiz.
16.20: Ziouv gorngv mbuox Mose caux Aalon,
16.18: Gorqv-mienh ziouc dorh gorqv-mienh nyei hung-louh, zorqv douz caux hung hietv jienv gu'nyuoz, mingh caux Mose caux Aalon souv jienv Wuic Buangh Ndopv-Liuh nyei gaengh ndaangc.
16.33: Ninh mbuo liemh nangh caux jienv ninh mbuo nyei yietc zungv ga'naaiv ziouc ndortv njiec yiemh gen. Ndau ziouc gapv jienv ndipc, ngatv jienv ninh mbuo. Ninh mbuo zuqc mietc, maiv duqv caux zuangx mienh yiem aqv.
16.43: Mose caux Aalon ziouc mingh taux Wuic Buangh Ndopv-Liuh nyei nza'hmien.
16.48: Ninh souv jienv ziangh nyei caux daic mingh nyei mienh mbu'ndongx, domh wuon-baengc ziouc dingh mi'aqv.
16.22: Mose caux Aalon ziouc mbaapv njiec ndau gorngv, “O Tin-Hungh aac, maanc mienh nyei lingh wuonh nyei Tin-Hungh! Nduqc dauh mienh baamz zuiz, meih oix nouz zuangx baeqc fingx fai?”
16.42: Zuangx mienh gapv zunv doix Mose caux Aalon wuov zanc, ninh mbuo huin mingh Wuic Buangh nyei Ndopv-Liuh wuov. Liemh zeih maaih mouc daaih om jienv Ndopv-Liuh. Ziouv nyei njang-laangc yaac hinc cuotv daaih.
16.50: Wuon-baengc dingh nzengc, Aalon ziouc nzuonx Wuic Buangh Ndopv-Liuh nyei gaengh ndaangc, Mose wuov.
16.31: Mose gorngv setv naaiv deix waac, yiem Aa^mbi^lam mbuo nyei zaux-ndiev nyei ndau mbaaix.
16.4: Mose haiz naaiv deix waac ninh mbaapv njiec ndau
16.29: Se gorngv naaiv deix mienh daic hnangv pou-tong nyei mienh daic, fai zuqc sic hnangv pou-tong mienh haih zuqc nyei sic nor, se bun cing maiv zeiz Ziouv  paaiv yie daaih.
16.9: I^saa^laa^en nyei Tin-Hungh ginv meih mbuo yiem I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei zuangx baeqc fingx mbu'ndongx cuotv daaih, dorh meih mbuo daaih nitv fatv ninh, bun meih mbuo yiem zaangc Ziouv  nyei ndopv-liuh zoux gong fu-sux, yaac yiem zuangx baeqc fingx nyei nza'hmien fu-sux ninh mbuo. Naaiv meih mbuo haiz se faix-fiuv sic fai?
16.37: “Oix zuqc mbuox Aalon sai mienh nyei dorn, E^le^aa^saa, mingh zorqv yiem wuov douz gu'nyuoz wuov deix hung-louh. Aengx dorh yiem hung-louh nyei douz-taanx mingh guangc go deix nyei dorngx weic zuqc naaiv deix hung-louh cing-nzengc nyei.
16.5: yaac gorngv mbuox Kolaa caux gan Kolaa daaih wuov deix, “Njang ndorm Ziouv  oix biux mengh haaix dauh benx ninh nyei mienh, haaix dauh cing-nzengc, yaac oix bun wuov dauh daaih nitv fatv ninh. Ninh oix ginv haaix dauh ziouc bun wuov dauh daaih nitv fatv ninh.
16.3: Ninh mbuo gapv zunv daaih yiem Mose caux Aalon nyei nza'hmien nzaeng gorngv, “Meih mbuo zoux jiex jaax mi'aqv. Zuangx baeqc fingx dauh dauh zungv cing-nzengc nyei. Ziouv  yaac caux ninh mbuo yiem. Hnangv naaic, meih mbuo weic haaix diuc taaih ganh zoux gauh hlo jiex zuangx baeqc fingx?”
16.39: E^le^aa^saa sai mienh ziouc zorqv nzengc zuqc douz buov wuov deix mienh dorh daaih fongc horc nyei dongh siqv hung-louh, yaac bun mienh daav daaih buang jienv ziec-dorngh,
16.6: Kolaa aah! Oix zuqc hnangv naaiv nor zoux. Meih caux gan meih nyei mienh oix zuqc dorh hung-louh daaih.
16.8: Mose aengx gorngv mbuox Kolaa, “Meih mbuo Lewi Mienh muangx maah!
16.46: Mose gorngv mbuox Aalon, “Zorqv meih nyei hung-louh daaih, zorqv ziec-dorngh nyei douz caux jienv hung dapv jienv, gaanv mingh zuangx mienh wuov tengx ninh mbuo fiqv zuiz. Ziouv nouz haic mienh ziouc bun domh wuon-baengc jiez gorn butv cuotv aqv.”
16.7: Njang hnoi oix zuqc yiem Ziouv  nyei nza'hmien zorqv douz caux hung an jienv hung-louh. Ziouv  ginv haaix dauh, dongh wuov dauh cing-nzengc. Lewi Mienh aah! Meih mbuo zoux jiex jaax mi'aqv.”
16.32: Ndau nqoi hnangv morngx nqoi nzuih, naqv ninh mbuo caux ninh mbuo nyei jaa-dingh, caux Kolaa nyei yietc zungv mienh, aengx caux ninh mbuo nyei yietc zungv ga'naaiv.
16.25: Mose ziouc mingh taux Ndaataan caux Aa^mbi^lam wuov. I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei mienh gox yaac gan jienv ninh mingh.
16.17: Gorqv-mienh oix zuqc dorh gorqv-mienh nyei hung-louh, aengx zorqv hung hietv jienv gu'nyuoz fungx bun Ziouv.  Yietc zungv maaih nyic baeqv hmz ziepc norm hung-louh. Meih caux Aalon yaac oix zuqc dorh ganh nyei hung-louh daaih.”
16.12: Mose paaiv mienh mingh heuc E^li^apc nyei dorn, Ndaataan caux Aa^mbi^lam daaih. Mv baac ninh mbuo gorngv, “Yie mbuo maiv mingh aqv.
16.34: Yiem weih gormx nyei I^saa^laa^en Mienh yietc zungv haiz ninh mbuo heuc ziouc gaanv biaux, heuc jienv gorngv, “Nziex ndau oix liemh yie mbuo naqv aav loh!”
16.30: Mv baac se gorngv Ziouv  zoux siang-sic, ndau nqoi, naqv nzengc naaiv deix mienh caux ninh mbuo maaih nyei yietc zungv ga'naaiv, bun ninh mbuo liemh nangh ndortv njiec taux yiemh gen, meih mbuo ziouc hiuv duqv naaiv deix mienh mangc piex Ziouv.  ”
16.11: Hnangv naaiv, meih caux gan meih nyei zuangx mienh gapv zunv daaih caux Ziouv  doix-dekc. Aalon hnangv haaix nor meih mbuo cingx ngopv ninh?”
16.28: Mose gorngv, “Meih mbuo oix hnangv naaiv nor hiuv duqv Ziouv  paaiv yie daaih zoux naaiv deix yietc zungv sic, maiv zeiz yie ei ganh nyei hnyouv hnamv cuotv daaih zoux.
16.45: “Simv nqoi naaiv deix zuangx mienh aqv. Ndongc nziepv dangh m'zing yie oix mietc nzengc ninh mbuo.” Ninh mbuo i dauh ziouc mbaapv njiec ndau.
16.19: Kolaa caux gan ninh nyei mienh ziouc gapv zunv caux Mose caux Aalon souv jienv hmien doix hmien yiem Ndopv-Liuh nyei gaengh ndaangc. Ziouv  nyei njang-laangc ziouc hinc cuotv bun zuangx baeqc fingx buatc.
16.35: Aengx maaih douz yiem Ziouv cuotv daaih buov qui nzengc dorh hung mingh fongc horc wuov deix nyic baeqv hmz ziepc dauh mienh.
16.41: Da'nyeic hnoi zuangx baeqc fingx ngopv Mose caux Aalon. Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Meih mbuo daix Ziouv  nyei mienh mi'aqv.”
16.13: Meih dorh yie mbuo yiem ndau-touv longx nyei deic-bung cuotv daaih yiem deic-bung-huaang daix yie mbuo. Naaiv corc maiv gaengh gaux? Meih zungv oix zoux hlo gunv yie mbuo?
16.40: hnangv Ziouv longc Mose mbuox E^le^aa^saa zoux nor. Naaiv se weic tengx I^saa^laa^en Mienh jangx zuqc, cuotv liuz Aalon nyei zeiv-fun, maiv maaih haaix dauh duqv yiem Ziouv nyei nza'hmien buov hung. Nziex haih zuqc hnangv Kolaa caux gan Kolaa wuov deix mienh.
16.26: Ninh kuinx zuangx mienh, “Simv nqoi naaiv deix mienh waaic mienh nyei ndopv-liuh. Maiv dungx muoqv ninh mbuo nyei haaix nyungc ga'naaiv. Nziex meih mbuo laaix ninh mbuo nyei zuiz zuqc guaatv mingh.”
16.14: Maiv daan mbuoqc naaiv! Meih zungv maiv dorh yie mbuo bieqc norm ndau-touv longx nyei deic-bung, yaac maiv bun yie mbuo duqv nzipc lingh deic caux a'ngunc biouv nyei huingx. Meih corc oix gueix naaiv deix mienh nyei m'zing cuotv fai? Yie mbuo za'gengh maiv mingh aqv.”
16.27: Mienh ziouc simv nqoi Kolaa, Ndaataan caux Aa^mbi^lam nyei ndopv-liuh. Ndaataan caux Aa^mbi^lam cuotv daaih caux auv-jueiv caux fu'jueiv-faix souv jienv ganh nyei ndopv-liuh gaengh ndaangc.
16.38: Se dongh baamz zuiz ziouc zuqc guangc maengc wuov deix mienh nyei hung-louh. Oix zuqc zorqv naaiv deix hung-louh daav daaih benx yietc kuaaiv yietc kuaaiv buang jienv ziec-dorngh, weic zuqc naaiv deix hung-louh fongc horc jiex bun Ziouv  ziouc cing-nzengc nyei. Hnangv naaiv se zoux jangx-hoc bun I^saa^laa^en Mienh.”
16.49: Zuqc wuon-baengc daic nyei mienh maaih yietc waanc biei cin cietv baeqv dauh, maiv funx laaix Kolaa nyei jauv zuqc daic wuov deix.
16.10: Ninh dorh meih caux meih nyei zuangx gorx-youz, Lewi Mienh, daaih nitv fatv ninh. Mv baac meih mbuo corc oix nzaeng zoux sai mienh?
16.2: Aengx maaih nyic baeqv hmz ziepc dauh, dongh zuangx baeqc fingx ginv daaih, maaih mengh dauh nyei bieiv zeiv.
16.1: Kolaa, Ndaataan, Aa^mbi^lam caux On jiez gorn doix-dekc ngaengc jienv Mose. Kolaa se Itc^haa nyei dorn, Itc^haa se Ko^haatv nyei dorn, Ko^haatv se Lewi nyei dorn. Ndaataan caux Aa^mbi^lam zoux E^li^apc nyei dorn, On zoux Beletc nyei dorn. Naaiv deix buo dauh se Lu^mben Fingx.
16.24: “Mbuox zuangx baeqc fingx simv nqoi Kolaa, Ndaataan caux Aa^mbi^lam nyei ndopv-liuh maah!”
16.16: Mose mbuox Kolaa, “Njang hnoi meih caux gan meih wuov deix mienh oix zuqc daaih yiem Ziouv nyei nza'hmien. Meih ganh caux wuov deix mienh aengx caux Aalon oix zuqc daaih.
